T02D1793-1:192b-6: gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor te zhes bstan pa yin
T02D1793-1:192b-7: gyis 'dri ba'i dkyil 'khor tsam ni ma yin no

T02D1793-1:192b-9: gyi cho ga'i rim pas bshad par bya zhes bya
T02D1793-1:192b-10: // ba'i don to // lus dang ngag dang sems
T02D1793-1:192b-11: mnyam par gzhag pas so zhes pa ni rdo rje
T02D1793-1:192b-12: slob dpon gyis rang gi lus la sogs pa yang
T02D1793-1:192b-14: de la rdo rje slob dpon gyis dkyil 'khor bri
T02D1793-1:192b-15: ba'i dus su sems ni rang gi yi dam gyi
T02D1793-1:192b-16: lha bsgom pa la 'jug pa dang ngag kyang sngags
T02D1793-1:192b-17: bzlas pa la brtson par 'gyur ba dang lus kyang
T02D1793-1:192b-18: dkyil 'khor dri ba dang thig gdab pa dang g-yas
T02D1793-1:192b-19: brkyang ba la sogs pas yongs su bskor pa'i bya
T02D1793-1:192b-20: ba la 'jug par 'gyur ba'i bya bas so ;

T02D1793-1:192b-22: pa ni gang gi dkyil 'khor mang po 'dri ba
T02D1793-1:192b-23: dang de'i sgo nas grags pa thob pa de ni
T02D1793-1:192b-24: las kyi cho ga mthong ba'i slob dpon no //
T02D1793-1:192b-25: gang gi tshe de kho na nyid bcu shes pa
T02D1793-1:192b-26: dang bzo'i rigs thams cad shes pa'i rdo rje slob
T02D1793-1:192b-27: dpon yin na de'i tshe dkyil 'khor bri ba la
T02D1793-1:192b-28: sogs pa'i snod du gyur pa yin no //
T02D1793-1:192b-29: de nyid bcu ni yongs shes pa //
T02D1793-1:192b-30: dkyil 'khor bri ba la ni mkhas //
T02D1793-1:192b-32: dkyil 'khor dang ni ting nge 'dzin phyag rgya dang //
T02D1793-1:192b-33: sngags dang byed pa stang stabs bzlas sbyin sreg / phyag rgya sngags dang nges spyir bsdu ba ni //
T02D1793-1:192b-34: de nyid bcu ni sngags kyi tshul las so //
T02D1793-1:192b-36: rnam par bgo ba'o zhes pa thig kyang brgya rtsa
T02D1793-1:192b-37: brgyad kyis phye bar bya ste cha cung la sogs
T02D1793-1:192b-38: pa'i rim pas zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02D1793-1:192b-39: dkyil 'khor ston pas thig skud do //
T02D1793-1:192b-40: zhes pa ni phyi dang nang gi dkyil 'khor gyi
T02D1793-1:192b-41: dbye bas phye ba'i de nyid thig skud kyis gsal
T02D1793-1:192b-43: gzhan dag tu ma spyad pa'o zhes pa ni khru
T02D1793-1:192b-44: tshad drug dkyil 'khor gzhan la thig ma btab pa'o
T02D1793-1:192b-45: // yang dag par bsgril ba'o zhes pa na brtan
T02D1793-1:192b-46: par bsgril bas te ji ltar chad par mi 'gyur
T02D1793-1:192b-47: // bas so // gzhan du na skyon chen por 'gyur te /
T02D1793-1:193a-3: dkyil 'khor gyi nyis lnga pa bo zhes pa ni
T02D1793-1:193a-4: khru tshad nyi shu rtsa bzhi 'am yang na khru
T02D1793-1:193a-6: de yang phyogs re re 'am thams cad du dkyil 'khor gyi dbyibs las shes par bya'o //
T02D1793-1:193a-7: des ni mtshams bzhi'i thig legs par btab par 'gyur ro //
T02D1793-1:193a-8: tshon sna lnga pa la ste zhes pa ni rim
T02D1793-1:193a-9: pa ji lta ba bzhin du kha dog lnga dang
T02D1793-1:193a-10: ldan pa'i thig skud kyis so //
T02D1793-1:193a-11: des ni de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i rang bzhin gyis gsungs zhes 'byung ngo //
T02D1793-1:193a-12: dkyil 'khor 'dri ba dang rjes su mthun pa'i thig skud bstan to //
T02D1793-1:193a-13: shin du phra ba dang sbom pa ma yin pa'i
T02D1793-1:193a-14: zhes pa ni tshad par ma tsam gyis zhes bya
T02D1793-1:193a-16: thig skud sbom pos ri mo sbom po dang phra bas kyang phra mor gyur te /
T02D1793-1:193a-17: sbom po byung na nad 'byung dang //
T02D1793-1:193a-20: de lta bu'i thig skud kyis zhes pa ni /
T02D1793-1:193a-21: thig skud kyi mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02D1793-1:193a-22: dkyil 'khor gyi tshang bstan pa yin no zhes pa ni sdud pa pos zhes tshig lhag ma'o //
T02D1793-1:193a-23: khru bcu gnyis pa zhes pa ni phyogs re'ang kun du ste /
T02D1793-1:193a-24: snang ba dang snang ba mched pa dang snang ba
T02D1793-1:193a-25: nye bar thob pa dang 'od gsal ba'i bdag nyid

T02D1793-1:193a-27: che ba'i dbye bas rnam pa bcu gnyis yin pa'i
T02D1793-1:193a-28: phyir ro // gang gi phyir snang ba la sogs
T02D1793-1:193a-29: pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin ni bcom ldan 'das
T02D1793-1:193a-31: zur bzhi dang ldan pa'i phyir ro zhes pa ni kun tu bzang po yin pas so //
T02D1793-1:193a-32: shar la sogs pa'i sgo bzhi dang ldan pa ste //
T02D1793-1:193a-33: zhes pa ni rta babs dang dril bu dang ba
T02D1793-1:193a-34: dan dang mu tig gi phreng ba dang rnga yab
T02D1793-1:193a-35: dang dra ba dang dra ba phyed pa la sogs
T02D1793-1:193a-36: pa dang ldan pa'i shar la sogs pa'i sgo bzhi
T02D1793-1:193a-37: dang bcas pa zhes bya ba'i don to //

T02D1793-1:193a-39: ni nang gi dkyil 'khor la khru bzhi pa la
T02D1793-1:193a-40: sogs pa med do zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1793-1:193a-41: 'khor lo ste nang gi dkyil 'khor zhes pa ni
T02D1793-1:193a-42: dkyil 'khor 'di ni rim pa gnyis pa yin no
T02D1793-1:193a-43: zhes bstan to // nang gi zlum po dang /
T02D1793-1:193a-44: phyi'i gru bzhi pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1793-1:193b-0: de nyid bstan par bya ba'i phyir kun @193b nas
T02D1793-1:193b-1: yongs su zlum po lta bur bri bar bya'o zhes
T02D1793-1:193b-2: pa ni nang gi dkyil 'khor nyid do //
T02D1793-1:193b-3: cho ga ni sa sbyang ba la sogs pa'i cho
T02D1793-1:193b-4: ga nyi shu'o zhes pa ni 'phags pa klu sgrub
T02D1793-1:193b-5: kyi zhal snga nas kyis mdzad pa'i sa sbyang ba
T02D1793-1:193b-6: la sogs pa'i cho ga rnam pa nyi shu ston
T02D1793-1:193b-8: da ni sems can rnams 'jug par bya ba'i phyir
T02D1793-1:193b-9: sgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga bshad par bya
T02D1793-1:193b-10: ste / slob dpon la lan gnyis gsum zhus pa //
T02D1793-1:193b-11: gsang ba'i bdud rtsi dam pa'i snod //
T02D1793-1:193b-12: yang dag dang zhing dad pa ldan //
T02D1793-1:193b-13: thar pa 'dod pa'i slob ma rnams //
T02D1793-1:193b-14: dpal ldan 'dus pa'i rjes bzung ba'i //
T02D1793-1:193b-15: byang chub la sbyor bdag gis 'di //
T02D1793-1:193b-16: de ltar bla mas de dag gzung //
T02D1793-1:193b-17: sting rje dang ldan sems kyis so //
T02D1793-1:193b-18: rdo rje slob dpon ni theg pa chen po'i tshul
T02D1793-1:193b-19: la mkhas pa 'gro ba thams cad gdon pa'i bsam
T02D1793-1:193b-20: pa dang ldan pa dad pa dang thos pa la
T02D1793-1:193b-22: chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba khong du chud pas /
T02D1793-1:193b-23: yul gyi spyod pa ma lus pa dri ma med
T02D1793-1:193b-24: par byas pa kun tu 'gro ba'i chos kyi dbyings
T02D1793-1:193b-25: so sor 'bigs pa'i bsam pas dga' ba'i rnam par
T02D1793-1:193b-27: shes rab kyi tshogs mngon par 'phel bas brdzun pa'i
T02D1793-1:193b-28: rnam par rtog pa'i bag chags las byung ba'i gti
T02D1793-1:193b-29: mug gi dra ba'i rab rib ring du byas pa'i
T02D1793-1:193b-30: slob dpon la gang gi tshe slob mas zhus pa
T02D1793-1:193b-31: de'i tshe / sems can gyi khams thams cad 'di
T02D1793-1:193b-32: ni bla na med pa'i bde ba chen po'i go
T02D1793-1:193b-33: 'phang la bdag gis gzhag par bya'o zhes bsam pas
T02D1793-1:193b-34: de'i tshe / / khyod kyis yo byad kun tshogs

T02D1793-1:193b-36: de'i tshe / / // cung zad tshogs te cung
T02D1793-1:193b-37: zad ma tshogs so zhes gal te de skad smra
T02D1793-1:193b-38: de'i tshe / / // na de'i tshe / de'i
T02D1793-1:193b-39: lte bar dgod pa'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng
T02D1793-1:193b-40: du yi ge h'um gi 'od zer gyis snying la
T02D1793-1:193b-41: gnas pa'i yi ge kam las bskyed pa kha dog
T02D1793-1:193b-42: nag po ma rungs pa sha za dang 'dra ba'i
T02D1793-1:193b-43: sdig pa sna khung g-yas pa nas phyung ste /
T02D1793-1:193b-44: yi ge h'um yang snying gar phyin pa las byung ba g-yas brkyang ba la gnas pa /
T02D1793-1:193b-45: mchi ba rnam par gtsigs pa lto ba 'phyang ba /
T02D1793-1:193b-46: kha dog nag po mche ba dang bcas pa'i g-yon pa'i sdigs mdzub snying gar 'chang ba /
T02D1793-1:194a-0: mche ba dang bcas pa'i phyag g-yas pa 'greng ba @194a * //
T02D1793-1:194a-1: rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi khro bo'i rgyal po'i gzugs bsams te /
T02D1793-1:194a-2: phyung la aom badzra ya ksha kro dha kha da
T02D1793-1:194a-3: kha da sarba p'a pam bya sya h'um phat ces
T02D1793-1:194a-4: bya bas sdig pa de zos la /
T02D1793-1:194a-5: yi ge sam yongs su gyur pa las kun du bzang po'i gzugs su slob ma bsams la /
T02D1793-1:194a-6: sngar bshad pa'i bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i sngags kyis de'i sems kyi bgegs phur bus btab la /
T02D1793-1:194a-7: de las byung ba'i drag po'i 'od zer gyi tshogs kyis gdug pa rnams bsregs la /
T02D1793-1:194a-8: slob ma'i sems bsrung bar bya ba'i don du spyi
T02D1793-1:194a-9: bo'i steng du dbyangs dang po las byung ba'i zla
T02D1793-1:194a-10: ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i dbyangs tha ma las
T02D1793-1:194a-11: byung ba rdo rje rgya gram de nyid du gnas
T02D1793-1:194a-12: pa yi ge ham gis byin gyis brlab par bya'o
T02D1793-1:194a-14: de nas sgrub thabs las bshad pa'i gnas su //
T02D1793-1:194a-15: de las bshad pa'i bsrung ba'i cho ga dang ting
T02D1793-1:194a-16: nge 'dzin gsum bsgom pa sngon du 'gro bar phra
T02D1793-1:194a-17: bo'i rnal 'byor la sogs pa gang yang rung ba'i
T02D1793-1:194a-18: bsgom pas sems brtan par byas la /
T02D1793-1:194a-19: lha re re la 'bum phrag gcig dang khri phrag
T02D1793-1:194a-20: gcig bzlas la shar dang byang phyogs kyi cha ru
T02D1793-1:194a-21: / mdor bsdus pas ni dge ba sgrub //
T02D1793-1:194a-22: zug rngu'i skyon dang nges par bral //
T02D1793-1:194a-23: shar dang byang phyogs mtho ba ste //
T02D1793-1:194a-24: me tog shing gis nye bar mdzes //
T02D1793-1:194a-25: yang na gang du yid dga' ba //
T02D1793-1:194a-26: de nyid du ni brtsams par bya //
T02D1793-1:194a-27: de nas phyi dro'i dus su mi bskyod pa'i rnal
T02D1793-1:194a-28: 'byor dang ldan pas yi ge lam las byung ba'i
T02D1793-1:194a-29: sa'i lha mo kha dog ser mo lag pa gnyis
T02D1793-1:194a-30: kyis gser gyi bum pa bsnams pa /

T02D1793-1:194a-32: lag pa g-yas pas sa gnon pas bskul bar bya'o //
T02D1793-1:194a-33: skyob pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02D1793-1:194a-34: spyod pa'i tshul dang khyad par gyi //
T02D1793-1:194a-35: sa dang pha rol phyin pa la //
T02D1793-1:194a-36: lha mo khyod ni dbang du gyur //
T02D1793-1:194a-37: sh'a kya seng ge skyob pa yis //
T02D1793-1:194a-38: ji ltar bdud dpung 'joms par mdzad //
T02D1793-1:194a-39: de bzhin bdud dpung las rgyal nas //
T02D1793-1:194a-40: bdag gis dkyil 'khor bri bar bgyi //
T02D1793-1:194a-41: sngags pas cho ga bzhin bskul nas //
T02D1793-1:194a-42: sa gzhi lag pas reg byas nas //
T02D1793-1:194a-43: me tog dri tshogs kyis mchod nas //
T02D1793-1:194a-44: de nyid du ni thim par bsam //
T02D1793-1:194a-45: de nas zhing skyong la sogs pa la gtor ma
T02D1793-1:194a-46: dang mchod pa la sogs pa byin nas sa gzhi
T02D1793-1:194b-0: la gsol ba gdab cing de nyid @194b du nyal
T02D1793-1:194b-1: bar bya'o // gal te rmi lam la sogs pas slu bar gyur na de'i tshe /
T02D1793-1:194b-2: zhag gnyis pa'i nyin phyed kyi dus su gang yang
T02D1793-1:194b-3: rung ba'i khro bo'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pas mngon
T02D1793-1:194b-4: spyod kyi cho gas bgegs gzhom par bya ba'i don
T02D1793-1:194b-5: du sbyin sreg byas la de'i phyi dro khrus byas
T02D1793-1:194b-6: shing gtsang sbra yan lag dris byugs pa /
T02D1793-1:194b-7: rdo rje 'chang gi nga rgyal dang ldan pas 'chad
T02D1793-1:194b-8: par 'gyur ba'i cho gas zhi ba'i sbyin sreg byas
T02D1793-1:194b-9: te / pus mo dang rked pa dang /

T02D1793-1:194b-13: rus pa dang rde'u la sogs pa bton nas /

T02D1793-1:194b-15: des gang bar byas la bdud rtsi 'khyil pa bzlas pa'i bdud rtsi'i chus bsang gtor bya zhing /
T02D1793-1:194b-16: mi bskyod pa'i rnal 'byor pas gzhal yas khang pa'i
T02D1793-1:194b-17: nang na gnas pa rin po che dang sman dang
T02D1793-1:194b-18: 'bru thams cad kyi snying po can phyogs bzhir rta
T02D1793-1:194b-19: babs dang lcags ris bskor ba thams cad du rnam
T02D1793-1:194b-20: pa sna tshogs pa'i dril bu dang ba dan dang
T02D1793-1:194b-21: / rgyal mtshan dang bla re rgyas pas mchog tu
T02D1793-1:194b-22: mdzes pa dpal bdud rtsi zhes bya ba khro bo'i
T02D1793-1:194b-23: rnal 'byor gyis yi ge gsum gyis mngon par 'dus
T02D1793-1:194b-24: byas pa'i bdud rtsi lngas byugs pa /
T02D1793-1:194b-25: me tog dang spos la sogs pa dang ldan pa
T02D1793-1:194b-26: khro bo'i lta bas g-yon phyogs su blta zhing rim
T02D1793-1:194b-27: gyis bgegs bskrad pa dang phyogs bcing ba byas la
T02D1793-1:194b-28: / aom dhum kham zhes bya bas sa gzhi nam
T02D1793-1:194b-29: mkhar byas te h'um lam h'um zhes bya bas rdo
T02D1793-1:194b-30: rje'i rdul phra rab kyis yongs su rdzogs par byas
T02D1793-1:194b-31: / la / aom me d'i n'i badzr'i bha ba

T02D1793-1:194b-33: lag pa g-yas pas reg cing yi ge gsum gyis
T02D1793-1:194b-34: byin gyis brlab cing mi mngon par sngags gdab par
T02D1793-1:194b-35: / la / bya'o // khang thog gam 'og khang
T02D1793-1:194b-36: ngam nags tshal lam kun dga' ra ba'am gtsug lag
T02D1793-1:194b-37: khang la sogs pa'am chu bo'i 'gram du sa gzhi
T02D1793-1:194b-38: brko na yi ge gsum bzlas par bya'o zhes bya

T02D1793-1:194b-41: ston zla tha chungs la sogs nas //
T02D1793-1:194b-42: zla ba gsum gsum brtsams nas g-yon //
T02D1793-1:194b-43: lho dang nub dang byang phyogs dang //
T02D1793-1:194b-44: shar du mgo ni gzhag nas nyal //
T02D1793-1:194b-45: glo g-yon nyal ba de nyid kyi //
T02D1793-1:195a-2: mgo dang ska [?] la sogs brkos pas na //
T02D1793-1:195a-3: skyon ni rgya chen shes par bya //
T02D1793-1:195a-5: de nas nyin re 'am zla re 'am lo re dkyil 'khor bri bar bya ste /
T02D1793-1:195a-6: nya nas brtsams te ji srid nya phyi ma'i bar
T02D1793-1:195a-7: du yar gyi ngo'i tshes gcig nas brtsams te brgyad
T02D1793-1:195a-8: pa'am dgu pa la sogs pa'i bar du dang /

T02D1793-1:195a-10: de nas sngar bshad pa'i gnas bskyed pa'i rim pas
T02D1793-1:195a-11: gzhal yas khang pa'i nang du dkyil 'khor gyi rnam
T02D1793-1:195a-12: pa can gyi sa gzhi lhag par mos te de
T02D1793-1:195a-13: bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa dang dkyil 'khor pa'i
T02D1793-1:195a-14: lha'i gnas su de bzhin du padma dang zla ba
T02D1793-1:195a-15: la sogs pa'i gdan rnams bsams la /
T02D1793-1:195a-16: de'i dbus kyi gdan la bzhugs pa'i rdo rje 'chang
T02D1793-1:195a-17: gi rang bzhin gyi bdag nyid du mgu bar byas
T02D1793-1:195a-18: te / deng bdag skye ba 'bras bu bcas //
T02D1793-1:195a-19: bdag ni gson pa 'ang bur bcas //
T02D1793-1:195a-20: lha dang dam tshig gis mnyam par //
T02D1793-1:195a-21: gyur par bdag ni som nyi med //
T02D1793-1:195a-22: byang chub sems dang sems gcig las //
T02D1793-1:195a-23: mi ldog par ni bdag 'gyur te //
T02D1793-1:195a-24: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su ni //
T02D1793-1:195a-25: deng bdag skye bar the tshom med //
T02D1793-1:195a-26: de ring bdag la zhag mchog ste //
T02D1793-1:195a-27: deng bdag mchog sbyin bla na med //
T02D1793-1:195a-28: sangs rgyas thams cad spyan drangs pas //
T02D1793-1:195a-29: deng bdag tshogs ni mchog yin no //
T02D1793-1:195a-30: zhes bya ba la sogs pas so //

T02D1793-1:195a-34: phyogs rnams thams cad na bzhugs pa'i //
T02D1793-1:195a-35: sangs rgyas bdag la dgongs su gsol //
T02D1793-1:195a-36: che ge mo bdag rdo rje can //
T02D1793-1:195a-37: che ge mo zhes dkyil 'khor bri //
T02D1793-1:195a-38: sangs rgyas kun sogs 'dir gshegs nas //
T02D1793-1:195a-39: bdag la dngos grub stsal du gsol //
T02D1793-1:195a-41: de nas dbus kyi gdan la gnas shing bdag po'i
T02D1793-1:195a-42: rnal 'byor dang ldan pas sku la sogs pa byin
T02D1793-1:195a-43: gyis brlabs pa'i 'og tu rdo rje'i rigs can mngon
T02D1793-1:195a-44: par 'dus byas pa'i phyi'i phyag rgya dang ldan pas
T02D1793-1:195a-45: mchod pas bsdus pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du badzra
T02D1793-1:195a-46: dhri ka ces bya ba la sogs pas mi bspyod
T02D1793-1:195a-47: [*ba spyod?] pa la sogs pa phyung zhing zhe sdang
T02D1793-1:195b-0: la sogs pa'i @195b spyod pa dang ldan pa'i sems
T02D1793-1:195b-1: can gyi don byas la slar yang gshegs te rang
T02D1793-1:195b-2: rang gi gnas la bzhugs par bsams la /
T02D1793-1:195b-3: spro ba dang bsdu ba dang 'jug pa dang brtan par 'gyur ba dang /
T02D1793-1:195b-4: rjes su chags pa dang las la gnas par bya ste /
T02D1793-1:195b-6: aom sva bh'a ba shuddho& ham /
T02D1793-1:195b-8: zhes bya ba brjod pas rdo rje'i bdag nyid dang rang bzhin gyis dag pa dang /
T02D1793-1:195b-9: lha thams cad dang dbyer med pa'i bdag nyid bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1793-1:195b-10: des rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor
T02D1793-1:195b-11: dang ldan pas shar la sogs pa'i phyogs la gnas
T02D1793-1:195b-12: pa rdo rje dang dril bu mchog tu 'dzin pa
T02D1793-1:195b-13: nye bar sgrub pa po rnams kyis /
T02D1793-1:195b-14: de bzhin gshegs pa kun zhi zhes bya ba la
T02D1793-1:195b-15: sogs pa'i bstod pa'i mchod pas dkyil 'khor bri bar
T02D1793-1:195b-16: bya ba'i phyir slob dpon la gsol ba gdab par
T02D1793-1:195b-17: bya'o // de nas rdo rje dril bu 'dzin pa'i
T02D1793-1:195b-18: slob dpon gyis sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal
T02D1793-1:195b-19: nas h'um ba dzro ta ti shtha zhes bya bas
T02D1793-1:195b-20: ji ltar sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo nam
T02D1793-1:195b-21: bya'o // mkhar bzhag ste / dpal rdo rje 'chang gi nga rgyal dang ldan pas /
T02D1793-1:195b-22: mig g-yon pa ta las zla ba /
T02D1793-1:195b-23: mig g-yas pa ma las nyi mar byas pa /
T02D1793-1:195b-24: rdo rje 'chang gi nga rgyal dang ldan pas dkyil
T02D1793-1:195b-25: 'khor gyis gzhi'i phyogs su yongs su bskor nas rdo
T02D1793-1:195b-26: rje rab la sogs pa kun du bkod nas rkang
T02D1793-1:195b-27: pa'i 'og tu sna tshogs rdo rje bsgoms nas /
T02D1793-1:195b-28: sgeg pa dang bcas pa'i gar byas te rdo rje'i
T02D1793-1:195b-29: zhabs kyis khro bo dang bcas pa rdo rje sems
T02D1793-1:195b-30: dpa'i rgyal dang ldan pas yi ge gsum brjod cing
T02D1793-1:195b-31: dkyil 'khor gyi sa gzhi la yongs su bskor bar
T02D1793-1:195b-32: bya'o// rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor ldan //
T02D1793-1:195b-33: ma mchu'i kha sbyor ngos gzung ba //
T02D1793-1:195b-34: dpal ldan g-yon phyogs sgeg 'chang pas //
T02D1793-1:195b-35: phyogs kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bya //
T02D1793-1:195b-36: steng dang 'og gnyis byin brlabs nas //
T02D1793-1:195b-37: sa dang sa steng mtho ris bsgom /
T02D1793-1:195b-38: yi ge h'um ni brjod bzhin pa //
T02D1793-1:195b-39: bdag nyid ngan pas mnan mi nus //
T02D1793-1:195b-41: de nas snga ma bzhin du rin po che sna
T02D1793-1:195b-42: bzhi'i rang bzhin gyi mchod rten bsams la gsang ba'i
T02D1793-1:195b-43: dkyil 'khor du mi'u thung lto ba chen po kha
T02D1793-1:195b-44: dog nag po ral pa can zhal bzhi pa /
T02D1793-1:195b-46: g-yas pa dag gis rdo rje dang 'khor lo bsnams la /
T02D1793-1:196a-2: zhal de rnams sgo bzhir gyur pa las gdul bya
T02D1793-1:196a-3: rnams sangs rgyas kyi go 'phang thob par bya ba'i
T02D1793-1:196a-4: phyir rang gi lto ba la 'jug par byed pa'i
T02D1793-1:196a-5: rten gyur pa rdo rje he ru ka'i rang bzhin
T02D1793-1:196a-6: gyi dkyil 'khor du gyur par bsams te /
T02D1793-1:196a-7: sgo phye ba'i sngags kyis sgo rnams phye bar byas
T02D1793-1:196a-8: te gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor sngags 'dis dgug par bya
T02D1793-1:196a-9: ste / aom badzra mandala h'um dza:/
T02D1793-1:196a-10: aom ma h'a badzra tsa kra aa dhi ti shtha h'um /
T02D1793-1:196a-11: de dag gis dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i rnam pa byin gyis brlabs la /
T02D1793-1:196a-12: aom kha kha zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga
T02D1793-1:196a-13: ma bzhin du 'phags pa bdud rtsi 'khyil pa zhes
T02D1793-1:196a-14: bya ba'i khro bo'i bsam gtan gyi phur bus /
T02D1793-1:196a-15: dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol gyi grva bzhir aom badzra
T02D1793-1:196a-16: mung+ga ra h'um zhes bya ba 'dis phur bu gdab
T02D1793-1:196a-17: par bya'o // de nas snga ma bzhin du yi
T02D1793-1:196a-18: ge h'um brjod pas phyogs dang phyogs mtshams dang nam
T02D1793-1:196a-19: mkha' bcing ba la sogs pa'i srung ba byas la
T02D1793-1:196a-20: 'chad par 'gyur ba'i cho gas 'phags pa bdud rtsi
T02D1793-1:196a-21: 'khyil pas yongs su bzlas pa'i las thams cad pa'i
T02D1793-1:196a-22: bum pa ku shu'i chun po dang ldan pa dkyil
T02D1793-1:196a-23: 'khor gyi phyi rol lam nang ngam sgo'i gam du
T02D1793-1:196a-24: 'jug par 'dod pa'i slob ma rnams la bsang gtor
T02D1793-1:196a-26: bgegs mthar byed kyi nga rgyal gyis snying po'i sngags bzla bar bya'o //
T02D1793-1:196a-27: nye ba'i sgrub pa pos kyang /
T02D1793-1:196a-28: shar phyogs nas brtsams te bdud rtsi lngas dkyil 'khor gyi sa gzhi byug par bya'o //
T02D1793-1:196a-29: de nas bdag po lnga'i gnas su gru bzhi pa
T02D1793-1:196a-30: tsandan dang bcas pa'i bdud rtsi lnga'i mandala rang rang
T02D1793-1:196a-31: gi lha'i sngags kyis yang dag par bzlas pa gnas
T02D1793-1:196a-32: ji lta ba bzhin du byas la me tog dgram
T02D1793-1:196a-33: ste rdo rje slob dpon dbus kyi mandala gyi sna
T02D1793-1:196a-34: tshogs padma dang zla ba la gnas pas /
T02D1793-1:196a-35: mandala de nyid la snga ma bzhin du gdan rnams bsams te /
T02D1793-1:196a-36: lha'i 'khor lo rang rang gi gnas la bzhugs par
T02D1793-1:196a-37: bltas te nam mkha' la gnas pa gcig tu byas
T02D1793-1:196a-38: nas bla na med pa dang bcas pa'i mchod pa
T02D1793-1:196a-40: gser dang dngul dang rdza la sogs pa'i rang bzhin
T02D1793-1:196a-41: nag po dang rtsa ba med pas lto ba che
T02D1793-1:196a-42: ba mgrin pa ring ba mchu 'phyang ba me tog
T02D1793-1:196a-43: gi phreng ba dang bcas pa'i ras gnyis kyis mgul
T02D1793-1:196b-0: pa bcings pa khar lo ma dang @196b bcas pa
T02D1793-1:196b-1: rang gi lhag pa'i lha'i mtshan mas mtshan pa /
T02D1793-1:196b-2: dkar po'am dmar po ba dan gtod pa la bri ha ti dang kanda ka ri dang /
T02D1793-1:196b-4: aa pa ra dzi ta ste sman chen po dang ldan pa /
T02D1793-1:196b-5: nor bu dang mu tig dang byi ru dang dngul
T02D1793-1:196b-6: dang gser gyi rin po che dang ldan pa til
T02D1793-1:196b-7: dang nas dang ma sha dang gro dang 'bras so
T02D1793-1:196b-8: ba ste 'bru lnga dang ldan pa'i rnam par rgyal
T02D1793-1:196b-9: ba'i bum pa badzra dhri ka ces bya ba brgya
T02D1793-1:196b-10: rtsa brgyad du bzlas pa'i aa rgha'i dri'i chu cung
T02D1793-1:196b-11: zad mngon par 'dus byas pa bdud rtsi lnga yang
T02D1793-1:196b-12: der bcug ste / yi ge h'um gis 'phags pa
T02D1793-1:196b-13: bdud rtsi 'khyil ba ral pa gcig ma dang snyoms
T02D1793-1:196b-14: par zhugs par bsgoms te dbang bskur nas mchod po
T02D1793-1:196b-15: rnam pa lnga bla na med pa dang bcas pa
T02D1793-1:196b-16: la sogs pa'i mchod pas mchod la /
T02D1793-1:196b-17: de la me tog gi phreng ba dang bcas pa'i
T02D1793-1:196b-18: hya sha steng du rdo rje gzhag nas de'i phreng
T02D1793-1:196b-19: ba'i mthar lag pas blangs la /
T02D1793-1:196b-20: aom a'a: bi ghna nta kri ta h'um phat ces bya ba brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas la /
T02D1793-1:196b-21: me tog dkar po bkram nas spos dbul bar bya'o //
T02D1793-1:196b-22: de bzhin du rdo rje me ltar 'bar ba dang
T02D1793-1:196b-23: thugs rdo rje dag gis thams cad la yang byas
T02D1793-1:196b-25: de la me ltar 'bar ba ni yi ge h'um
T02D1793-1:196b-26: las byung ba kha dog sngon po g-yas brkyang pa
T02D1793-1:196b-27: la gnas pa snying gar g-yon pa'i khu tshur gyi
T02D1793-1:196b-29: cig shos kyis 'bar ba'i rdo rje bsnams pa bsgom mo //
T02D1793-1:196b-31: aom badzra aa na la ha na da ha pa tsa ma tha bha nydza ra na h'um phat /
T02D1793-1:196b-32: ji srid lha'i 'khor lo dgod pa de srid kyi
T02D1793-1:196b-33: bar du nyin re dag lan gsum du byas te
T02D1793-1:196b-34: bum pa lhag par gnas pa'o //
T02D1793-1:196b-35: de nas phyi rol gyi gtor ma byin nas 'phags
T02D1793-1:196b-36: pa bdud rtsi 'khyil ba zhes bya bas bgegs bskrad
T02D1793-1:196b-37: pa'i sbyin sreg dang rdo rje 'chang chen pos zhi
T02D1793-1:196b-38: ba'i sbyin sreg kyang byas la dkyil 'khor la bzhugs
T02D1793-1:196b-39: su gsol nas mchod cing aa rgha phul nas lhag
T02D1793-1:196b-40: par gnas par bya'o// lce'i rtse mor yi ge h'um
T02D1793-1:196b-41: las byung ba'i rdo rje bsams la aom padma sa
T02D1793-1:196b-42: ra sa te ma wa rta ya sho dha ya
T02D1793-1:196b-43: h'um hr'i:ra hr'i: zhes bya bas lce byin gyis brlabs
T02D1793-1:196b-44: la spos khang lag tu thogs te yan lag thams
T02D1793-1:196b-46: thugs rjes phan 'dogs nus ldan pa'i //
T02D1793-1:197a-0: sangs rgyas bdag la dgongs su @197a * //
T02D1793-1:197a-2: / bdag ces bya ba che ge mo //
T02D1793-1:197a-3: thugs kyi rdo rje dkyil 'khor mchog / ci nus pa yi mchod pa yis //
T02D1793-1:197a-4: bdag gis nang bar dkyil 'khor bri //
T02D1793-1:197a-5: slob ma rnams la brtse ba dang //
T02D1793-1:197a-6: khyed rnams la yang mchod pa'i phyir //
T02D1793-1:197a-7: slob ma dang bcas bdag la ni //
T02D1793-1:197a-8: thugs rje nye bar blangs nas su //
T02D1793-1:197a-9: sras bcas kun gyis dkyil 'khor du //
T02D1793-1:197a-10: yang dag par ni bzhugs par mdzod //
T02D1793-1:197a-11: sras dang bcas par 'dir gshegs nas //
T02D1793-1:197a-12: dkyil 'khor yongs su gzung bar mdzod //
T02D1793-1:197a-14: de ni dkyil 'khor lhag par gnas pa'o //
T02D1793-1:197a-15: de nas slob ma lhag par gnas par bya ste /
T02D1793-1:197a-16: sngar bshad pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i slob ma
T02D1793-1:197a-17: dkyil 'khor gyi sgor mngon par kha bltas pas slob
T02D1793-1:197a-18: dpon la phyag byas te 'di ltar smra bar bya'o
T02D1793-1:197a-19: // dga' chen khyod bdag ston pa po //
T02D1793-1:197a-20: slob dpon khyod ni dgongs su gsol //
T02D1793-1:197a-21: byang chub chen po'i tshul bstan pa'i ;
T02D1793-1:197a-22: / mgon po chen po bdag 'tshal lo //
T02D1793-1:197a-23: dam tshig de nyid bdag la stsol //
T02D1793-1:197a-24: byang chub sems kyang bdag la stsol //
T02D1793-1:197a-25: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun ni //
T02D1793-1:197a-26: dkon mchog gsum yang bdag la stsol //
T02D1793-1:197a-27: thar pa chen po'i grong mchog tu //
T02D1793-1:197a-30: de nas slob dpon gyis slob ma gtso bo mngon du byas nas 'di skad bka' stsal te /
T02D1793-1:197a-31: de yang slob ma re res 'bod pa re rer shes par bya'o //
T02D1793-1:197a-32: tshur shog rigs bu theg chen gyi //
T02D1793-1:197a-33: sngags kyi spyod pa cho ga'i tshul //
T02D1793-1:197a-34: theg chen la khyod snod gyur pas //
T02D1793-1:197a-35: yang dag khyod la bstan par bya//
T02D1793-1:197a-36: gang zhig sangs rgyas 'das pa dang //
T02D1793-1:197a-37: de bzhin gang zhig ma byon dang //
T02D1793-1:197a-38: gang zhig mgon po da ltar byung //
T02D1793-1:197a-39: 'gro la phan phyir bzhugs pa ste //
T02D1793-1:197a-40: thar pa'i cho ga mchog 'di ni //
T02D1793-1:197a-41: bzang po mkhyen nas de kun gyis //
T02D1793-1:197a-42: byang chub drung du dpa' bo yi //
T02D1793-1:197a-43: kun mkhyen mtshan nyid med thob bo//
T02D1793-1:197a-44: sngags kyi sbyor ba gzhal med 'di //
T02D1793-1:197a-45: gang gis sh'akya seng ge yis //
T02D1793-1:197a-46: bdud dpung 'jigs pa chen po ni //
T02D1793-1:197a-47: skyob pa yis ni 'joms par mdzad //
T02D1793-1:197a-48: bu kye kun mkhyen nyid thob phyir //
T02D1793-1:197a-49: de bas blo ni brtan par gyis //
T02D1793-1:197a-50: zhes bya bas mnga' bdag byas la slob ma re
T02D1793-1:197b-0: re me'i dkyil du gnas pa'i yi @197b ge ram
T02D1793-1:197b-1: gyi mes thal bar byas la /
T02D1793-1:197b-2: de'i rnam par shes pa yi ge gsum gyi bdag nyid rang gi khar bcug ste /
T02D1793-1:197b-3: bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin rdo rje'i lam nas
T02D1793-1:197b-4: phyung la de'i sku la sogs pa byin gyis brlab
T02D1793-1:197b-5: pa dang h'um las byung ba'i snying gar rdo rje
T02D1793-1:197b-6: dang / a'a kham w'i ra h'um zhes bya bas
T02D1793-1:197b-7: lkog ma dang spyi bo dang dpung pa g-yas pa
T02D1793-1:197b-8: dang g-yon pa dang snying gar rim pa ji lta
T02D1793-1:197b-10: sdig pa bshags pa la 'di ltar byed du bcug ste /
T02D1793-1:197b-11: bdag gis sdig pa gang byas pa'am //
T02D1793-1:197b-12: byed du 'jug gam rjes yi rang //
T02D1793-1:197b-13: deng de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02D1793-1:197b-14: mdun du so sor bshags par bgyi //
T02D1793-1:197b-15: sangs rgyas mgon po'i bsod nams gang //
T02D1793-1:197b-16: rang rgyal slob ma rnams kyi gang //
T02D1793-1:197b-17: 'gro ba thams cad rnams kyi yang //
T02D1793-1:197b-18: de ni bdag gis rjes yi rang //
T02D1793-1:197b-19: sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yis //
T02D1793-1:197b-20: chos kyi rin chen bla na med //
T02D1793-1:197b-21: byang chub sems sogs slob dpon la //
T02D1793-1:197b-22: bdag gis yang dag skyabs su mchi //
T02D1793-1:197b-23: sangs rgyas rnams ni chos gsungs shig / nam yang mya ngan 'das ma gshegs //
T02D1793-1:197b-24: sems can bde ba can mdzod cig / go 'phang mchog ni thob par mdzad //
T02D1793-1:197b-25: byang chub sems ni bla na med //
T02D1793-1:197b-26: ji ltar sangs rgyas kyis bskyed pa //
T02D1793-1:197b-27: de sras byang chub sems dpas kyang //
T02D1793-1:197b-28: de bzhin bdag gis bskyed par bgyi ;
T02D1793-1:197b-29: / kun gyi dbang phyug gnas nas kyang //
T02D1793-1:197b-30: bdag ni kun rig gyur pa yis //
T02D1793-1:197b-31: gting med srid pa'i rgya mtsho la //
T02D1793-1:197b-32: 'gro ba thams cad bsgral bar bgyi //
T02D1793-1:197b-33: ji ltar stobs ni sangs rgyas nyid //
T02D1793-1:197b-34: thob pa'i rgyur ni bdag gyur cig / gal te ma nus de yi tshe //
T02D1793-1:197b-35: smon lam dag ni bag gis bgyi //
T02D1793-1:197b-36: skye ba 'di la grub pa'i phyir //
T02D1793-1:197b-37: de yi thabs la brtson byas pa //
T02D1793-1:197b-38: skyon med bde dang yon tan ldan //
T02D1793-1:197b-39: phun sum tshogs kun dbang phyug 'gyur //
T02D1793-1:197b-40: bdag gis bsod nams gang byas pa //
T02D1793-1:197b-41: gang zhig kyang ni byed par 'gyur //
T02D1793-1:197b-42: des ni bdag dang 'gro ba dag / bde gshegs
T02D1793-1:197b-43: go 'phang thob par shog / ces brjod du gzhug
T02D1793-1:197b-44: ste / de'i snying gar yi ge h'um gis zla
T02D1793-1:197b-45: ba'i steng du rdo rje bsams la dri'i chu dang
T02D1793-1:197b-46: bcas pa lag pa g-yas pa'i rdo rje can gyis
T02D1793-1:197b-47: reg cing su ra ta sa ma ya stvam ho
T02D1793-1:197b-48: siddhya badzra ya th'a su kham zhes bya bas byin
T02D1793-1:197b-49: ste / gyis brlabs la / yi ge aom dang
T02D1793-1:197b-50: a'a: dag las spyi bo dang lkog ma dag tu
T02D1793-1:198a-0: ste / gyis brlabs la / @198a * // 'khor lo dang padma bsams la //
T02D1793-1:198a-1: dzi na dzi ka / a'a ro li ka ces
T02D1793-1:198a-2: bya ba dag gis de nyid la reg la yi
T02D1793-1:198a-3: ge gsum brjod pas de rnams kyi lag tu dri
T02D1793-1:198a-4: dang me tog byin nas spos gtul te snang bas
T02D1793-1:198a-5: gsal bar byas nas 'phags pa bdud rtsi zhes bya
T02D1793-1:198a-6: ba bzlas pa'i shing au du mb'a ra 'am aa
T02D1793-1:198a-7: shva ttha yor bcu gnyis pa bu ga med pa
T02D1793-1:198a-8: dri'i chus bkrus la dkyil 'khor la me tog bcings
T02D1793-1:198a-9: pa'i so shing thal mo sbyar ba'i slob ma rnams
T02D1793-1:198a-10: la byang phyogs su bltas pa'i bla mas sbyin par
T02D1793-1:198a-11: bya'o // de rnams kyis kyang ba'i pags pa tsam
T02D1793-1:198a-12: gyi tshad kyi dkyil 'khor gyi dkyil du 'dug nas
T02D1793-1:198a-13: bya'o // / shar phyogs su su kha bltas pa'am
T02D1793-1:198a-14: byang phyogs su kha bltas pas rtse mo zos te
T02D1793-1:198a-15: ma chags pa mngon du ltos pa med par dor
T02D1793-1:198a-16: bya'o // / bar bya'o // de la mngon du
T02D1793-1:198a-17: bab pa na bar chad med pa'i dngos grub thams
T02D1793-1:198a-19: de ni gyen du bab na rig pa 'dzin pa'i dngos grub tu 'gyur ro //
T02D1793-1:198a-20: 'og tu kha dang ldan pa bab nas 'og gi dngos grub tu 'gyur ro //
T02D1793-1:198a-21: g-yas skor ba'i rim pas shar phyogs su kha bltas par bab na /
T02D1793-1:198a-22: rgyas pa dang mngon spyod dang /
T02D1793-1:198a-23: dbang dang zhi ba la sogs pa 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02D1793-1:198a-24: mandala nas phyi rol du bab na grub par mi 'gyur ro //
T02D1793-1:198a-25: de nas yi ge pam las skyes pa de nyid kyis bzlas pa'i slob dpon gyis chu blangs la /
T02D1793-1:198a-26: de rnams kyi lag pa la sbyin te /
T02D1793-1:198a-27: a'om hr'i: bi shu ddha: sarba dharm'a sarba pa pam ni shtsa sya bi sho dha ya /
T02D1793-1:198a-28: sarba bi kalpa na aa pa na ya h'um zhes
T02D1793-1:198a-29: bya ba bzlas pa'i dri dang bdud rtsi'i chu'i 'thor
T02D1793-1:198a-31: aom a'a: h'um zhes bya ba bzlas pa'i yi ge
T02D1793-1:198a-32: h'um las skyes pa sar pa ma nyams pa'i ku
T02D1793-1:198a-33: sha gcig dbu sngas dang yi ge h'um las skyes
T02D1793-1:198a-34: pa'i bdud rtsi 'khyil pa bzlas pa'i ku sha gnyis
T02D1793-1:198a-36: de nyid kyis bzlas pa'i srung skud gsum khugs yi ge gsum gyis brtan par byas la /
T02D1793-1:198a-37: de rnams kyi dpung pa g-yas pa la mdud pa gsum rang gis bcings te /
T02D1793-1:198a-38: aom buddha mee tri ra ksha ra ksha sarba sv'a
T02D1793-1:198a-39: h'a zhes bya ba'i byams pa'i go chas bsrung zhing
T02D1793-1:198a-40: chos bstan pas dga' bar byas te /
T02D1793-1:198a-41: bdag nyid chen po khyod rnams kyis //
T02D1793-1:198a-42: de ring rnyed pa gzhal med rnyed //
T02D1793-1:198a-43: gang gis khyod ni rgyal ba kun //
T02D1793-1:198b-0: sras @198b dang bcas pas bstan 'di la //
T02D1793-1:198b-1: thams cad yongs su gzung gyur la //
T02D1793-1:198b-2: bdag nyid che las skyes par 'gyur //
T02D1793-1:198b-3: des ni khyod rnams theg chen la //
T02D1793-1:198b-4: gang phyir nang par skye bar 'gyur //
T02D1793-1:198b-5: theg pa chen po 'byung ba che //
T02D1793-1:198b-6: de ni lam mchog dam pa yin //
T02D1793-1:198b-7: gang gis khyod rnams ma 'ongs pa'i //
T02D1793-1:198b-8: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams su 'gyur //
T02D1793-1:198b-9: rang 'byung skal pa che ldan pa'i //
T02D1793-1:198b-11: yod dang med pa las 'das pa'i //
T02D1793-1:198b-12: nam mkha' bzhin du dri ma med //
T02D1793-1:198b-13: zab cing gsang ba kun 'gro ba'i //
T02D1793-1:198b-14: rtog pa med cing gnas med pa //
T02D1793-1:198b-15: spros pa thams cad dang bral ba'i //
T02D1793-1:198b-16: spro pa rnams kyis ma spros pa //
T02D1793-1:198b-17: las dang bya ba la sogs bral //
T02D1793-1:198b-18: bden pa gnyis dang dbyer med pa //
T02D1793-1:198b-19: 'di ni theg chen dam pa ste //
T02D1793-1:198b-20: tshul la gnas pas thob par 'gyur //
T02D1793-1:198b-22: kye bzhin bzangs dag longs shig rdo rje 'chang chen
T02D1793-1:198b-23: po'i drin gyis nang par thugs kyi dkyil 'khor mthong
T02D1793-1:198b-25: ji ltar mthong ba'i rmi lam yang bdag kho na
T02D1793-1:198b-26: la smros shig ces brjod nas nyal du gtong ngo
T02D1793-1:198b-27: zhes pa ni lha dang slob ma lhag par gnas
T02D1793-1:198b-28: pa'i cho ga'o // de nas dkyil 'khor yang dag par mchod cing /
T02D1793-1:198b-29: slob ma dang bcas pas yid mnyam par gzhag pa'i
T02D1793-1:198b-30: slob dpon gyis dkyil 'khor gyis gzhi'i mthar nyal bar
T02D1793-1:198b-31: bya'o // zhag gnyis pa'i rnal 'byor byas pas de
T02D1793-1:198b-32: bzhin du dkyil 'khor de ni nam mkha'i dkyil du
T02D1793-1:198b-33: bteg nas dkar po dang ser po dang dmar po
T02D1793-1:198b-34: dang ljang gu dang sngon po bdud rtsi dang bcas
T02D1793-1:198b-35: pa dri zhim po'i rdul tshon yungs kar gyi phye
T02D1793-1:198b-36: ma dang 'dres pas thig skud kha dog so sor
T02D1793-1:198b-37: btsos la rim pa de nyid kyis gzhag ste /
T02D1793-1:198b-38: aom sv'a a'a: h'a h'um gi sa bon gyis rnam
T02D1793-1:198b-39: par snang mdzad la sogs pa thig skud la 'god
T02D1793-1:198b-40: de / sa bon de nyid kyis rang rang gi
T02D1793-1:198b-41: phyogs na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi
T02D1793-1:198b-42: thugs ka na gnas pa de dang de'i kha dog
T02D1793-1:198b-43: dang ldan pa'i 'od zer gyis thig skud mthong nas
T02D1793-1:198b-44: de / / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D1793-1:198b-45: thams cad kyi thugs kyi dkyil 'khor la thig gdab
T02D1793-1:199a-0: rdo rje'i thig skud bdag la stsol cig ces bya bas rnam par snang mdzad @199a * //
T02D1793-1:199a-1: la sogs pa bskul bar bya ste /
T02D1793-1:199a-2: aom d'a bti dri shta aa dku sha dza zhes bya ba mig dag la bkod de /
T02D1793-1:199a-3: rab tu g-yo zhing 'gul ba'i mig //
T02D1793-1:199a-4: 'bar ba'i lta ba zhes su bshad //
T02D1793-1:199a-5: ces bya bas 'bar ba'i lta ba'i lcags kyus rnam
T02D1793-1:199a-6: par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i thugs ka nas 'od
T02D1793-1:199a-7: zer gyi thig skud de rnams kyis gsal bar 'gugs
T02D1793-1:199a-8: shing rang gi lag pa la gnas pa'i thig skud
T02D1793-1:199a-9: de dang dres par byas la /
T02D1793-1:199a-10: aom aa n+yo n+y'a nu ga ta sarba dharm'a: spha
T02D1793-1:199a-11: ra spha ra aa nu pra bi shta sarba dharma
T02D1793-1:199a-12: zhes brjod pas yi ge gsum bzla zhing dkyil 'khor
T02D1793-1:199a-13: las nyis 'gyur ba sgo'i nyi shu cha'i sbom pa'i
T02D1793-1:199a-15: yi ge ma dang ta dag las nyi ma dang zla ba mig dag la dgod de /
T02D1793-1:199a-16: tri shti mat zhes bya bas brtan par byas la
T02D1793-1:199a-17: dri dang bdud rtsis byugs pa'i gser la sogs pa'i
T02D1793-1:199a-18: snod du bzhag la dri la sogs pas mchod la
T02D1793-1:199a-19: lag pas rig cing yi ge gsum gyis brgya rtsa
T02D1793-1:199a-20: brgyad bzla'o // yang dkyil 'khor gyi sa gzhi snga
T02D1793-1:199a-21: ma bzhin du nye ba'i sgrub pa pos dris byugs
T02D1793-1:199a-22: la rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i me tog dgram zhing
T02D1793-1:199a-23: bar snang la gnas pa rnams la aa rgham dang
T02D1793-1:199a-24: dri la sogs pas mchod de phyag 'tshal nas rdo
T02D1793-1:199a-25: rje 'chang du gyur pas thig skud 'dzin pa rnam
T02D1793-1:199a-26: par snang mdzad dam bdud rtsi 'khyil ba'i rnal 'byor
T02D1793-1:199a-27: la gnas pa yang dag par byung ste /
T02D1793-1:199a-28: mig g-yon pa dang g-yas pa dag la yi ge
T02D1793-1:199a-29: dza las byung ba'i kha dog ser po zla ba
T02D1793-1:199a-30: dang nyi mar bsgoms la yi ge gsum gyis bzlas
T02D1793-1:199a-31: pa'i yungs kar phye ma dang 'dres pas bdud rtsi
T02D1793-1:199a-32: lnga dang ldan pa'i dri bzangs kyi chus bskus la
T02D1793-1:199a-33: / thig skyud de lag pa g-yon pa'i khu tshur gyis lte bar gzung bar bya'o //
T02D1793-1:199a-34: aom dza dza dza zhes bya bas slob ma la
T02D1793-1:199a-35: gtad la nye ba'i sgrub pa pos kyang aom dza
T02D1793-1:199a-36: dza dza zhes bya bas de nyid gzung zhing de
T02D1793-1:199a-37: bzhin du lte ba'i phyogs su 'dzin par bya'o //
T02D1793-1:199a-38: lha dang gnod sbyin gyi bdag po'i phyogs su zhal
T02D1793-1:199a-39: bltas pa'i rdo rje 'chang gis nam mkha'i thig skud
T02D1793-1:199a-40: gdab par bya'o // de nas phyogs thams cad kyi
T02D1793-1:199a-41: mnyam pa nyid la dmigs te tshangs pa'i thig skud
T02D1793-1:199a-42: gnyis dbus la btab nas gnod sbyin dang dbang po'i
T02D1793-1:199a-43: phyogs su zhal bltas pas yi dags dang klu'i phyogs
T02D1793-1:199a-44: su btab pa dang me dang rlung gi mtshams la
T02D1793-1:199b-0: @199b shar dang nub dang byang dang lho'i phyogs la
T02D1793-1:199b-1: thig btab nas yang me'i mtshams la gnas nas rlung
T02D1793-1:199b-2: gi mtshams thig gdab pa dang /
T02D1793-1:199b-3: bden bral la gnas pas dbang ldan gyi mtshams thig btab nas /
T02D1793-1:199b-4: shar dang nub dang byang dang lho'i phyogs bzhi'i thig
T02D1793-1:199b-5: gis dum bu brgyad pa'i dkyil 'khor la yang rim
T02D1793-1:199b-6: pa 'di nyid kyis yi ge gsum brjod pa sngon
T02D1793-1:199b-7: du 'gro bas thig gdab par bya'o //
T02D1793-1:199b-8: aom badzra sa ma ya s'u tram m'a ti kra
T02D1793-1:199b-9: ma h'um zhes zlos pas thig gdab pa'i sgras de
T02D1793-1:199b-10: bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha' la bzhugs pa la khyod
T02D1793-1:199b-11: kyis sems can gyi don bya ba'i dus yin pas
T02D1793-1:199b-12: 'di nyid du gshegs su gsol zhes pas bskul bar
T02D1793-1:199b-13: bya'o // thams cad la yang slob dpon dang nye
T02D1793-1:199b-14: ba'i sgrub pa po dag gis g-yas skor du 'gro
T02D1793-1:199b-15: bya'o // bar bya'o // gru bzhi pa dang zur bzhi pa //
T02D1793-1:199b-16: sgo bzhi pa dang rta babs bcas //
T02D1793-1:199b-17: thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan //
T02D1793-1:199b-18: dar dang me tog phreng bas brgyan //
T02D1793-1:199b-19: grva yi cha ni thams cad dang //
T02D1793-1:199b-20: sgo dang sgo khyud kha khyer la //
T02D1793-1:199b-21: rdo rje rin chen gyis spras pa'i //
T02D1793-1:199b-22: phyi yi dkyil 'khor thig gdab bya //
T02D1793-1:199b-23: de yi nang gi dkyil 'khor ni //
T02D1793-1:199b-24: dum bu brgyad dang dkyil 'khor mtshungs //
T02D1793-1:199b-25: phyi yi dkyil 'khor phyed kyi tshad //
T02D1793-1:199b-26: kun nas yongs su zlum po ste //
T02D1793-1:199b-27: rdo rje ka ba mchog gis spras //
T02D1793-1:199b-28: dge zhing rdo rje phreng bas bskor //
T02D1793-1:199b-29: hri yi khro bo'i lta ba yis //
T02D1793-1:199b-30: de nas sgo rnams phye bar bya //
T02D1793-1:199b-31: sgo ni 'khor lo'i cha brgyad pa //
T02D1793-1:199b-32: kha khyer dang ni bral bar 'dod //
T02D1793-1:199b-33: sgo khyud sgo yi tshad yin te //
T02D1793-1:199b-34: de bzhin lha yi snam bu yang //
T02D1793-1:199b-35: kun du kha khyer sgo yi phyed //
T02D1793-1:199b-36: de bzhin sgo 'gram sgo logs so //
T02D1793-1:199b-37: rdul tshon sa gzhi de phyed kyis //
T02D1793-1:199b-38: rtsa ba'i thig las phyi rol du //
T02D1793-1:199b-39: dra ba dra phyed me tog phreng //
T02D1793-1:199b-40: dar dpyang sogs rnams de bzhin no //
T02D1793-1:199b-41: kha kyer de kh'a la brten te //
T02D1793-1:199b-42: rta babs la ni ka ba gnas //
T02D1793-1:199b-43: rdo rje ka ba'i thig rnams ni //
T02D1793-1:199b-44: rdul tshon sa gzhi dang mtshungs pa //
T02D1793-1:199b-45: sgo las nyis 'gyur rta babs te /
T02D1793-1:199b-46: ba dan dril bu dang ldan pa //
T02D1793-1:199b-47: dril bu dang bcas rlung gis g-yo //
T02D1793-1:199b-48: phyi yi mtshams la ba dan rnams //
T02D1793-1:199b-49: 'khor lo dang mtshungs gzhan dag ni //
T02D1793-1:199b-50: ji ltar mdzes par brtag par bya //
T02D1793-1:199b-51: gal te kha cig thig btab la //
T02D1793-1:199b-52: snod med de tshe rang gis ni //
T02D1793-1:200a-2: phur bus btab la thig gdab bya //
T02D1793-1:200a-3: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi lte bar ji ltar bshad
T02D1793-1:200a-4: pa'i phur bu'am rdo rjes btab nas de la thig
T02D1793-1:200a-5: skud btags nas de mthe bong gi nang du sbyar
T02D1793-1:200a-7: phyi dang nang gi dkyil 'khor dag dang phyi rol
T02D1793-1:200a-8: gyi rdo rje dang 'khor lo dang padma'i ra ba
T02D1793-1:200a-9: dang dbang ldan gyi mtshams nas brtsams te //
T02D1793-1:200a-10: g-yas skor du thig btab nas //
T02D1793-1:200a-11: ye shes kyi thig skud gshegs su gsol bar bya'o //
T02D1793-1:200a-12: de nas bam lam ram yam ham gi sa bon
T02D1793-1:200a-13: las bskyed pa'i thig skud la bshad pa'i kha dog
T02D1793-1:200a-14: gi rim pas dkar po la sogs mtshon rnams rin
T02D1793-1:200a-15: po che las byung ba'am lcags lnga las byung ba'am
T02D1793-1:200a-18: so phag las byung ba'i sngar bshad pa'i sa bon
T02D1793-1:200a-19: las spyan ma la sogs pa dang yang dag par
T02D1793-1:200a-20: ldan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin du bsgoms
T02D1793-1:200a-21: la / yi ge h'um gis mngon par brlas pa'i
T02D1793-1:200a-22: yi ge dza yis 'bar ba'i lta bas rdul tshon
T02D1793-1:200a-23: rnams yang dag par sbar la yi ge h'um gis
T02D1793-1:200a-25: de'i bu ga tshon rnam pa lngas kun du gang
T02D1793-1:200a-26: bar byas la thugs rdo rje'i rnal 'byor dang ldan
T02D1793-1:200a-27: pas bla na med pa'i shes rab kyi dril bu'i
T02D1793-1:200a-28: sgras mtshan ma ngan pa la sogs pa bsal te
T02D1793-1:200a-29: chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa la lhag par
T02D1793-1:200a-30: mos nas g-yon pa'i khu tshur gyis dbang ldan gyi
T02D1793-1:200a-31: mtshams nas brtsams te shar phyogs su kha bltas par
T02D1793-1:200a-32: gyur nas / aom badzra tsi tra sa ma ya
T02D1793-1:200a-33: h'um zhes brjod nas g-yas skor nas rdul tshon gdab
T02D1793-1:200a-34: gyur nas / par bya'o // de nas ji ltar bde ba yis //
T02D1793-1:200a-35: mnyam pa bar med yon po med //
T02D1793-1:200a-36: bar chad med cing g-yas skor ba //
T02D1793-1:200a-37: sgo yi nyi shu'i cha yi tshad //
T02D1793-1:200a-38: ri mo mnyam po bri bar bya //
T02D1793-1:200a-39: sbom po byung na nad 'byung ste //
T02D1793-1:200a-41: yon po yis ni sdang ba ste //
T02D1793-1:200a-42: bar chad pas ni mkhan slob 'chi //
T02D1793-1:200a-43: g-yas skor ma yin phab pa na //
T02D1793-1:200a-44: rdul tshon phur bus btab par 'gyur //
T02D1793-1:200a-45: phyi yi re kh'a dkar po ste //
T02D1793-1:200a-46: gnyis pa kha dog ser po yin //
T02D1793-1:200a-47: gsum pa padma r'a ga mtshungs //
T02D1793-1:200a-49: nang gi re kh'a nag po ste //
T02D1793-1:200a-50: des na panytsa r'a ga'i rim //
T02D1793-1:200a-51: shar gyi sa gzhi dkar po ste //
T02D1793-1:200a-52: lho phyogs ser po dang mtshungs pa //
T02D1793-1:200b-0: @200b nub ni kha dog dmar po dang //
T02D1793-1:200b-1: byang ni ljang gu dang ldan pa //
T02D1793-1:200b-2: dbus ni aindra n'i la mtshungs //
T02D1793-1:200b-4: rtag tu mnyam par gzhag pa yis //
T02D1793-1:200b-5: rdo rje dril bu 'dzin pas bri //
T02D1793-1:200b-6: nas kyi 'bru tshod rdul tshon gyi //
T02D1793-1:200b-7: re kh'a phan tshun gdab par bya //
T02D1793-1:200b-8: dkyil 'khor bri ba'i dus su gal te bgegs byung
T02D1793-1:200b-9: na de'i tshe bdud rtsi zhes bya ba'i khro bo'i
T02D1793-1:200b-10: rnal 'byor dang ldan pas de'i phreng ba'i sngags bzlas
T02D1793-1:200b-12: na ma:sa manta k'a ya w'a ktsi tta badzr'a n'am /
T02D1793-1:200b-13: na mo badzra kro dh'a ya ma h'a dam shtrom
T02D1793-1:200b-14: tka ta bhee ra w'a ya aa si mu sa
T02D1793-1:200b-15: la p'a ra shu p'a sha ha st'a ya /
T02D1793-1:200b-16: aom aa mri ta kunda li kha kha kh'a hi
T02D1793-1:200b-17: kh'a hi ti shtha ti shtha bandha bandha ha na
T02D1793-1:200b-18: ha na da ha da ha gardza gardza bi spho
T02D1793-1:200b-19: ta ya bi spho ta ya sarba bighn'a na bi
T02D1793-1:200b-20: n'a ya k'a n'am ma h'a ga na pa ti
T02D1793-1:200b-21: dz'i wi t'a nta ka r'a ya h'um phat sv'a
T02D1793-1:200b-22: h'a / bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i rnal 'byor dang ldan
T02D1793-1:200b-23: pas lag pa g-yon pa'i srin lag dang mdzub mo
T02D1793-1:200b-24: gung mo dag bskum par byas te mthe'u chung dang
T02D1793-1:200b-25: mthe bong gi rtse mor yang dag par sbyar nas
T02D1793-1:200b-26: mche ba'i phyag rgya kha 'gram du bcas la yi
T02D1793-1:200b-27: ge phat bzlas pas bgegs bskrad par bya'o //
T02D1793-1:200b-28: yang na sngar bshad pa'i srung ba'i 'khor lo'i phur bus gdab par bya'o //
T02D1793-1:200b-29: yang na don dam par byang chub kyi sems bsgom par bya ste /
T02D1793-1:200b-30: gang gi phyir 'od gsal ba'i sems kyi bgegs 'byung
T02D1793-1:200b-31: ba gang yin pa de ni gnas skabs kyang ma
T02D1793-1:200b-32: yin gyi gnas kyang med de /
T02D1793-1:200b-33: bgegs la sogs pa'i tha mal pa'i rnam par rtog pa las 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1793-1:200b-34: de nas lha rnams dgod pa'i gnas su snga ma
T02D1793-1:200b-35: bzhin du padma dang nyi ma la sogs pa'i gdan
T02D1793-1:200b-36: rnams ji lta ba bzhin du blos bkod la badzra
T02D1793-1:200b-37: dhri ka ces bya ba la sogs pa'i snying po'i
T02D1793-1:200b-38: sngags brjod pas mtshan ma la nang du gnas pa'i
T02D1793-1:200b-39: lha'i gzugs dang nam mkha'i de bzhin gshegs pa gcig
T02D1793-1:200b-41: blugs pa'am 'bur du byas pa 'am bris pa'i phyag mtshan rnams dgod par bya'o //
T02D1793-1:200b-42: de la dbus su aindra n'i la dang 'dra ba
T02D1793-1:200b-43: bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar zhing 'jigs pa rtse lnga
T02D1793-1:200b-44: pa'i rdo rje bri bar bya'o //
T02D1793-1:200b-45: rnam par snang mdzad kyi gnas su rdo rje'i rnam
T02D1793-1:200b-46: pa dang 'dra ba'i 'bar ba can rtsibs brgyad pa'i
T02D1793-1:201a-0: de bzhin du rin chen 'byung ldan gyi @201a * //
T02D1793-1:201a-2: lha mo ro rdo rje ma'i bar du rim pa
T02D1793-1:201a-3: ji lta ba bzhin du me stag spro ba'i nyi
T02D1793-1:201a-4: ma dang 'dra ba'i rin po che dang padma dang
T02D1793-1:201a-5: ral gri 'od zer dang bcas pa dang sprin dang
T02D1793-1:201a-7: 'bar zhing kha dog sngon po rdo rje dang sdong bu dang bcas pa'i padma dang /
T02D1793-1:201a-8: de dang 'dra ba'i autpala sngon po dang 'bar ba
T02D1793-1:201a-9: dang bcas pa'i thob dang rdo rje la sogs pa'i
T02D1793-1:201a-10: 'bar ba dang ldan pa'i dbyug to dang ral gri'i
T02D1793-1:201a-11: rnam pas spro ba'i padma dang kha dog sngon po'i
T02D1793-1:201a-12: sna tshog rdo rje dang dbus dang shar la sogs
T02D1793-1:201a-13: pa'i phyogs bzhi ru sngon po dang dkar po dang
T02D1793-1:201a-14: dmar po dang ljang gu bri bar bya'o //
T02D1793-1:201a-15: shar gyi snam bu nas brtsams te //
T02D1793-1:201a-16: 'khor lo dang n'a ga ge sar gyi yal ga dang /
T02D1793-1:201a-17: yang na rdo rje dang rin po che dang padma dang /
T02D1793-1:201a-20: chos ston pa'i phyag rgya dang /
T02D1793-1:201a-21: phyi rol gyi snam bu'i grva bzhi ru me long
T02D1793-1:201a-22: dang pi wang dang dri'i dung phor dang khrag chen
T02D1793-1:201a-23: pos yongs su bkang pa'i thod pa bri bar bya'o
T02D1793-1:201a-24: // sgo bzhi po me'i mtshams la sogs pa bzhi
T02D1793-1:201a-25: la lcags kyu dang dbyug to dang rtse gsum dang
T02D1793-1:201a-27: shar phyogs kyi sgo'i tho ba'i gong du 'khor lo dang /
T02D1793-1:201a-28: de bzhin du nub kyi sgo'i padma'i rgyab tu dril
T02D1793-1:201a-29: bu dang bcas pa'i rdo rje'i padma dang nyi ma'i
T02D1793-1:201a-30: gdan gyi steng du dgod par bya'o //
T02D1793-1:201a-31: gal te 'dir thugs rdo rje la sogs pa nas
T02D1793-1:201a-32: gang yang rung ba'i lha sgrub par 'dod na de'i
T02D1793-1:201a-33: tshe / lo bcu gnyis lon pa'i bu mo dang /
T02D1793-1:201a-34: khye'u dag la mi bskyod pa dang m'a ma k'i la sogs pa zhugs nas /
T02D1793-1:201a-35: de dag gis thig gdab pa la sogs pa'i cho
T02D1793-1:201a-36: ga sngon du 'gro bar bris pa'i rten gyi dkyil
T02D1793-1:201a-37: 'khor la sgrub thabs las bshad pa'i gdan la gzugs
T02D1793-1:201a-38: dang kha dog dang zhal dang phyag la sogs pa
T02D1793-1:201a-39: dang ldan pa lha ma lus pa dgod pa'i gnas
T02D1793-1:201a-40: la ji bzhin du zhugs nas bsgrub par bya'o //
T02D1793-1:201a-41: phyogs bzhi ru rin po che la sogs pa'i rang bzhin gyi rta babs bzhi dang /
T02D1793-1:201a-42: me tog gi phreng ba dang dril bu dang ba
T02D1793-1:201a-43: dan la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i sgo bzhi rdo
T02D1793-1:201a-44: rje 'chang gi sngags kyis dbul bar bya'o //
T02D1793-1:201a-45: dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol du phyogs bzhi ru shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
T02D1793-1:201a-47: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba dang /
T02D1793-1:201a-48: gser 'od dam pa'i mdo sde rnams klog du gzhug go //
T02D1793-1:201a-49: ga pur dang aa ga ru dang tu ru skal
T02D1793-1:201b-0: sogs @201b pa'i spos khang phyogs dang mtshams su rgyun
T02D1793-1:201b-2: de nas nye ba'i sgrub pa pos bdud rtsi 'khyil
T02D1793-1:201b-3: ba'i nga rgyal dang ldan pas rdo rje rab nas
T02D1793-1:201b-4: phyi rol du bdud rtsi lnga dang bcas pa'i dri'i
T02D1793-1:201b-5: chus sa gzhi byugs te me tog bkram nas las
T02D1793-1:201b-6: thams cad pa bzlas pa'i chus dkyil 'khor la bsang
T02D1793-1:201b-7: gtong byas te de'i dbus su lag pa bzhag nas
T02D1793-1:201b-8: 'khor lo byin gyis brlab par bya ba'i phyir yi
T02D1793-1:201b-9: ge gsum brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas nas /
T02D1793-1:201b-10: aom a'a: bighn'a nta krai ta h'um phat //
T02D1793-1:201b-12: de nas mtshams kyi dus su dpal gnod mdzes kyi
T02D1793-1:201b-13: rgyal po'i nga rgyal dang ldan pas me tog sngon
T02D1793-1:201b-15: aom sumbha ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i sngags brjod pas dkyil 'khor du gzhug ste /
T02D1793-1:201b-16: dril bu dkrol zhing lan gsum bskor te /
T02D1793-1:201b-17: mtshang ba dang lhag pa'i skyon zhi bar bya ba'i
T02D1793-1:201b-18: phyir rdo rje la bltas te me tog gi phreng
T02D1793-1:201b-19: ba bcom ldan 'das la phul zhing /
T02D1793-1:201b-20: yang de nyid gar gyi tshul gyis blangs la rang
T02D1793-1:201b-21: gi mgo bo la yi ge h'um bzhi'i sngags kyis
T02D1793-1:201b-22: bcing bar bya'o // de nas phyi dang nang gi
T02D1793-1:201b-23: dkyil 'khor dag gi bar na gnas pa'i mnyam par
T02D1793-1:201b-24: gzhag pa'i rdo rje slob dpon gyis yi ge gsum
T02D1793-1:201b-25: brjod nas yid kyis sgo phye bar bya'o //
T02D1793-1:201b-26: sgo rnams shar la sogs par ni //
T02D1793-1:201b-27: nub kyi phyogs su gnas pa yis //
T02D1793-1:201b-28: rim gyis phye bar byas pa ste //
T02D1793-1:201b-29: de bzhin g-yas brkyang la sogs pas //
T02D1793-1:201b-31: sngar lhag par gnas par byas pa'i rnam par rgyal
T02D1793-1:201b-32: ba'i bum pa cho ga de nyid kyis lan bdun
T02D1793-1:201b-33: bzlas pas bdag po'i mdun du gzhag par bya'o //
T02D1793-1:201b-34: gzhan ma badzra dhri ka ces bya ba brgya rtsa
T02D1793-1:201b-35: brgyad bzlas pas 'jug pa'i sgo la mngon par phyogs
T02D1793-1:201b-36: par gzhag nas de'i chus bdag nyid dang slob ma
T02D1793-1:201b-37: bsang bar bya ba'i phyir bzhag nas bzlas la /
T02D1793-1:201b-38: dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol dang rdo rje'i ra ba'i bar na /
T02D1793-1:201b-39: shar dang lho'i sgo'i mtshams su mtshan nyid dang ldan
T02D1793-1:201b-40: pa rang gi lha dang rjes su mthun pa'i tshon
T02D1793-1:201b-41: gyis bris pa / ras dam pa gnyis kyis mgul
T02D1793-1:201b-42: ba bcings pa lo ma dang 'bras bur bcas par
T02D1793-1:201b-43: khar bcug la rin po che lnga dang sman dang
T02D1793-1:201b-45: bdud rtsi dang ldan pa'i tsandan gyi chus bkang ba /
T02D1793-1:201b-46: rang rang gi sngags kyis brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pa /
T02D1793-1:202a-1: mthar byed pa la sogs pa'i khro bo'i rgyal po'i bum pa gzhag par bya'o //
T02D1793-1:202a-2: de bzhin du lho dang nub kyi mtshams su dpal
T02D1793-1:202a-3: gnod mdzes kyi rgyal po nas brtsams te dri rdo
T02D1793-1:202a-4: rje ma'i bar du bum pa bzhi dang lnga gzhag
T02D1793-1:202a-5: go // de bzhin du nub dang byang gi mtshams
T02D1793-1:202a-6: su 'jig rten dbang phyug nas brtsams te spyan ma'i
T02D1793-1:202a-7: bar du bum pa bdun nyid do //
T02D1793-1:202a-8: byang dang shar gyi sgo'i mtshams su m'a ma k'i
T02D1793-1:202a-9: nas brtsams te mi bskyod pa'i bar du bum pa
T02D1793-1:202a-10: brgyad dgod do // ma tshogs na rnam par rgyal ba dang spyan ma la sogs pa bzhi dang /
T02D1793-1:202a-12: las thams cad kyi bum pa gang pa yang gzhag
T02D1793-1:202a-13: ste bcu las nyung bar mi bya'o zhes bshad pa'i
T02D1793-1:202a-14: phyir ro // de nas sgrub thabs las gsungs pa'i
T02D1793-1:202a-15: tshogs la sogs pa dang phyi'i yo byad kyis kyang
T02D1793-1:202a-16: dkyil 'khor mchod nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis rje
T02D1793-1:202a-17: ltar bshad pa'i rig ma dang lhan cig tu slob
T02D1793-1:202a-18: ma gzhug pa'i cho ga dang 'dra bar rang zhugs
T02D1793-1:202a-19: phyir ro // te / bcom ldan 'das kyi drung
T02D1793-1:202a-20: nas bum pa'i dbang dang gsang ba dang shes rab
T02D1793-1:202a-21: ye shes kyi dbang dang rjes su gnang ba dang
T02D1793-1:202a-22: dbugs dbyung ba dang lung bstan pa dang ting nge
T02D1793-1:202a-24: sna tshogs padma ras kyis bkab pa'i gdan gyi steng du gnas pas /
T02D1793-1:202a-25: sme sha can gyi bu mo lo bcu gnyis pa /
T02D1793-1:202a-26: bzhin bzangs mig ni yangs pa ste //
T02D1793-1:202a-27: rgyan rnams thams cad kyis brgyan pa //
T02D1793-1:202a-28: de nyid rig la rjes gnang ba //
T02D1793-1:202a-29: yon tan ska rags m'a ma k'i //
T02D1793-1:202a-30: sgrub thabs las bshad cho ga yis //
T02D1793-1:202a-31: dri dang me tog gis khyab pa //
T02D1793-1:202a-32: lha rnams thams cad mchod pa'i phyir //
T02D1793-1:202a-34: de nas rang gi byang chub kyi sems spro ba
T02D1793-1:202a-35: dang bsdu zhing zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du sngar bshad
T02D1793-1:202a-36: pa'i snying po rnams kyis dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor
T02D1793-1:202a-38: phyag mtshan gyi nang du gnas pa'i lha'i sku rnams la bsdus par bsams te /
T02D1793-1:202a-39: lcags kyu dang zhags pa thogs pa'i gnod mdzes kyi
T02D1793-1:202a-40: rgyal po'i yi ge dza'i mtha' can gyi h'um bzhi
T02D1793-1:202a-41: po'i sngags kyis ye shes kyi 'khor lo dgug cing
T02D1793-1:202a-42: lha re re'i thugs kar gzugs pa sngon du 'gro
T02D1793-1:202a-43: bas phung po la sogs pa byin gyis brlab pa
T02D1793-1:202a-44: dang sku gsung thugs byin gyis brlab pa'i bar du
T02D1793-1:202a-45: byas te / snga ma bzhin du rdo rje 'chang
T02D1793-1:202a-46: chen po la sogs pa'i cod pan dang dar dpyangs
T02D1793-1:202b-1: rjes su chags pa'i tshogs rjes su chags par byas
T02D1793-1:202b-2: nas snga ma bzhin du byang chub kyi sems de
T02D1793-1:202b-3: bzhin gshegs pa dgong ba'i rnam pa can du bsdus
T02D1793-1:202b-4: te padma la zhugs nas zhu bar gyur pa ye
T02D1793-1:202b-5: shes kyi bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D1793-1:202b-6: la sogs pas spyod par bya ba'i phyir phul la
T02D1793-1:202b-7: yang lha mo'i tshogs kyi gzugs su phyung zhing /
T02D1793-1:202b-8: bla na med pa'i mchod pa dang bcas pa'i mchod
T02D1793-1:202b-9: pa de rnams kyis dkyil 'khor la mchod nas yi
T02D1793-1:202b-10: ge gsum gyis bzlas pa'i me tog dang spos dang
T02D1793-1:202b-11: snang ba dang dri dang lha bshos phul te rdo
T02D1793-1:202b-12: rje 'chang la sogs pas mngon par bzlas pa'i dung
T02D1793-1:202b-13: phor la sogs pa'i snod la gnas pa bdud rtsi
T02D1793-1:202b-14: dang ti la dang nas dang ku sha dang dri
T02D1793-1:202b-15: bzangs me tog dkar po dang bcas pa'i dri chu
T02D1793-1:202b-16: gang yin pa des lha rnams la zhabs bsil dang
T02D1793-1:202b-17: mchod yon dbul bar bya ste /
T02D1793-1:202b-18: de nas mchod pa bya ba ni lha re re lan bza' gnyis gnyis sam /
T02D1793-1:202b-19: yang na thams cad la gcig gcig phul nas rnam
T02D1793-1:202b-20: pa sna tshogs pa'i gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba
T02D1793-1:202b-21: dan dang bla re rnams yi ge aom mam rdo
T02D1793-1:202b-23: badzra spha ra na khams zhes bya ba 'dis dbul lo //
T02D1793-1:202b-24: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta p'u dza me gha
T02D1793-1:202b-25: sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma ya shri
T02D1793-1:202b-26: ye h'um / zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis mngon pa
T02D1793-1:202b-27: 'dus byas pa'i ga pur dang aa ga ru dang
T02D1793-1:202b-28: tu ru shka la sogs pa'i dri bzangs tsandan dang
T02D1793-1:202b-29: 'dres pa dang me tog gi shing yang rung brgya'am
T02D1793-1:202b-30: bzhi dang me tog thams cad dang /
T02D1793-1:202b-31: spos khang stong ngam brgya'am bcu las nyung bar mi dbul lo //
T02D1793-1:202b-32: mar me 'bum phrag brgya'i grangs sam yang na mar me snod brgya 'am yang na bzhi 'bul lo //
T02D1793-1:202b-33: da ma thag du bshad pa'i sngags kyis me tog
T02D1793-1:202b-34: dang spos dang mar me'i mchod pa la sogs pa
T02D1793-1:202b-35: la re re dang sbyar ro //
T02D1793-1:202b-36: yi ge gsum gyis mngon par bzlas pa'i aom lo pi la sogs pa'i bza' ba dang /
T02D1793-1:202b-37: rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba
T02D1793-1:202b-38: dang myang ba dang nyes pa dang bcas pa dang
T02D1793-1:202b-39: nyes pa med pa'i gtor ma'i mchod pa yang stong
T02D1793-1:202b-40: phrag gi grangs su de nyid kyis dbul lo //
T02D1793-1:202b-41: rol mo stong ngam pi wang ngam //
T02D1793-1:202b-42: dung la sogs pa yang na rol mo bcu dbul lo //
T02D1793-1:202b-43: phyi'i gar mkhan dang gdu bu dang rna cha dang cod pan la sogs pa dang /
T02D1793-1:203a-0: rta dang glang po dang ba lang gi tshogs kyang legs par brgyan pa @203a * //
T02D1793-1:203a-2: gos dang bcas pa'i rta babs dang dril bu dang bcas pa'i rnga yab dang /
T02D1793-1:203a-8: kha dog sna tshogs pa dang /
T02D1793-1:203a-11: dbang po'i phyogs la sogs par dkyil 'khor gyi phyi
T02D1793-1:203a-12: rol du rim gyis ba dan brgyad dbul bar bya'o
T02D1793-1:203a-13: // yang bla na med pa'i mchod pa dang bcas pa'i mchod pa la sogs pas mchod cing //
T02D1793-1:203a-14: mi bskyod rdo rje ye shes che //
T02D1793-1:203a-15: zhes bya ba la sogs pas snga ma bzhin du bstod par bya'o //
T02D1793-1:203a-16: de'am gzhan gyis bstod nas dud phor la gnas pa'i
T02D1793-1:203a-17: bshang gci la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i spros pa'i
T02D1793-1:203a-18: byang chub kyi sems yi ge gsum gyis mngon par
T02D1793-1:203a-19: sbyangs te dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i dbus su phul
T02D1793-1:203a-20: nas dkyil 'khor pa rnams des tshim par bya'o //
T02D1793-1:203a-21: de nas mngon par 'dus byas pa'i bza' ba la sogs pa yang dbul lo //
T02D1793-1:203a-22: shar phyogs nas brtsams te lha la sogs pa la
T02D1793-1:203a-23: gtor ma byin nas lha rnams tshim par byed pa'i
T02D1793-1:203a-24: sbyin sreg bya'o // de nas gzhan la dkyil 'khor
T02D1793-1:203a-25: du zhugs nas dbugs dbyung ba dang lung bstan pa
T02D1793-1:203a-26: thob pa sngon du 'gro ba thams cad bskyed la
T02D1793-1:203a-27: slob ma rnams 'jug par bya ba'i phyir de ltar
T02D1793-1:203a-28: bden pa gsan du 'jug par bya ste /
T02D1793-1:203a-29: chos rnams gzugs brnyan dang mtshungs pa'i //
T02D1793-1:203a-30: dag cing dang ba dri ma med //
T02D1793-1:203a-31: gzung ba ma yin brjod bya min //
T02D1793-1:203a-32: rgyu dang las las kun 'byung ba //
T02D1793-1:203a-33: de bzhin de nyid las byung ba'i //
T02D1793-1:203a-35: 'dri med slob ma thams cad kyis//
T02D1793-1:203a-36: gzugs brnyan ltar gsal mthong bar byed //
T02D1793-1:203a-37: nam mkha' skyed pa'i mtshan ma'i phyir //
T02D1793-1:203a-38: thog ma tha ma med pa'i mchog / sems dpa' rdo rje che rang bzhin //
T02D1793-1:203a-39: rdor sems deng bdag 'grub par mdzod //
T02D1793-1:203a-40: dngos grub chen po kun gyi mchog / dbang phyug chen po lhag pa'i lha //
T02D1793-1:203a-41: rdo rje 'chang kun rgyal po ste //
T02D1793-1:203a-42: mi 'gyur dam pa bdag grub mdzod //
T02D1793-1:203a-43: khyod ni skyon med rtag pa ste //
T02D1793-1:203a-44: chags pa kun gyi rjes chags pas //
T02D1793-1:203a-45: chags pa chen po dga' ba che //
T02D1793-1:203a-46: bcom ldan de nyid bdag grub mdzod //
T02D1793-1:203a-47: shin du dag pa kun gyi mchog / gzod ma nas dag de bzhin gshegs//
T02D1793-1:203b-0: @203b kun du bzang po kun bdag nyid //
T02D1793-1:203b-1: byang chub sems dpa' bdag grub mdzod //
T02D1793-1:203b-2: dngos grub chen po kun gyi mchog / dbang phyug chen po rgya mchog gi //
T02D1793-1:203b-3: rdo rje chen po phul du byung //
T02D1793-1:203b-4: rdo rje sgeg bdag bdag grub mdzod //
T02D1793-1:203b-5: sems can kun gyi yid khyab pa //
T02D1793-1:203b-6: sems can kun gyi yab nyid de //
T02D1793-1:203b-7: dam tshig mchog ldan 'dod pa mchog / dben pa gang gis dkyil 'khor 'di //
T02D1793-1:203b-8: thabs dang shes rab bdag nyid can //
T02D1793-1:203b-9: mgon po bden pa de nyid kyis //
T02D1793-1:203b-10: bdag la re ba rdzogs par mdzod //
T02D1793-1:203b-11: ces bya ba'i dam tshig gsum gyi glu'i mchod pa dang gsol ba 'debs pa yang bya'o //
T02D1793-1:203b-12: de ni slob ma 'jug pa'i cho ga yin te
T02D1793-1:203b-13: snga ma bzhin du slob ma mngon par 'dus byas
T02D1793-1:203b-14: pas // dam tshig dang sdom pa khas blangs pa
T02D1793-1:203b-15: yon phul ba de'i snying gar snyoms par zhugs pa'i
T02D1793-1:203b-16: bde ba chen po rnam par bsams te /
T02D1793-1:203b-17: de'i sbyor ba'i g-yo ba las byung ba'i sgra'i kha
T02D1793-1:203b-18: dog dmar po yi ge aa'i 'od zer gyi phreng

T02D1793-1:206a-44: de srid 'gro don yal med pa //
T02D1793-1:206a-45: mya ngan 'das pas byed par nus //
T02D1793-1:206a-46: shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i thabs //
T02D1793-1:206a-47: bsod nams byin rlabs 'grub byed pa //
T02D1793-1:206a-48: dngos grub kun dbang 'grub pa yis //
T02D1793-1:206a-49: sems can gyi don brtan par byed //
T02D1793-1:206b-0: phyag rgya mngon par @206b rtogs bshad de //
T02D1793-1:206b-1: yid kyi sku ni brtan phyir ro //
T02D1793-1:206b-2: gang gis sku kun brtan pa ste //
T02D1793-1:206b-3: de phyir phyag rgya mngon par brjod //
T02D1793-1:206b-4: ces bya ba ni dam tshig go //
T02D1793-1:206b-5: de ltar dam tshig gsum byin nas //
T02D1793-1:206b-6: aom badzr'a dhi pa ti stvam aa bhi shi nytsa
T02D1793-1:206b-7: mi badzra m'a m'a bhi she ka ta zhes bya
T02D1793-1:206b-8: bas kye dpal che ge mo rdo rje zhes bya
T02D1793-1:206b-9: bas dpal gyi sgra dang sbyar ba ni ming gi
T02D1793-1:206b-10: dbang bskur ro // 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02D1793-1:206b-11: rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag na gnas //
T02D1793-1:206b-12: phyag na rdo rje'i brtul zhugs brtan //
T02D1793-1:206b-13: khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu zung //
T02D1793-1:206b-14: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta siddhi badzra sa ma
T02D1793-1:206b-15: ya ae sha stvam dha ra y'a mi hi hi
T02D1793-1:206b-16: hi hi hi h'um zhes bya ba brjod pas slob
T02D1793-1:206b-18: me tog la sogs pas mchod cing gzhag go //
T02D1793-1:206b-19: de ni bum pa'i dbang zhes bya bas bsdus pa'i phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbang bskur ro //
T02D1793-1:206b-20: bum pa'i dbang ni dang po ste //
T02D1793-1:206b-21: gsang ba'i dbang bskur gnyis pa yin //
T02D1793-1:206b-22: shes rab ye shes gsum pa yin //
T02D1793-1:206b-23: zhes le'u bco brgyad pa nas gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1793-1:206b-24: de nas skye bos dpen pa'i sa phyogs su sngags dang rgyud la legs par slob pa //
T02D1793-1:206b-25: bzhin bzang ba mig yangs pa de nyid /
T02D1793-1:206b-26: rig pa la sbyor ba dam tshig bsrung ba la brtson pa /
T02D1793-1:206b-27: bde ba thams cad kyi yo byad dang ldan pa
T02D1793-1:206b-28: rang gi rigs kyi bu mo rdo rje slob dpon
T02D1793-1:206b-29: la slob mas dbul bar bya'o //
T02D1793-1:206b-30: de nas g-yon phyogs na gnas pa'i de dang lhan cig tu gnas pa'i bla ma la //
T02D1793-1:206b-31: lcags kyu dang sgron ma'i bsnyen bkur dang dri dang phreng ba la sogs pa dang //
T02D1793-1:206b-32: rgya che ba'i phyi'i yo byad dang /
T02D1793-1:206b-33: bla na med pa dang bcas pa la sogs pa'i
T02D1793-1:206b-34: mchod pas yang dag par mchod cing pus mo g-yas
T02D1793-1:206b-36: de nas thal mo sbyar nas /
T02D1793-1:206b-37: slob dpon che la gsol ba gdab //
T02D1793-1:206b-38: khyod kyis zhabs kyi drin gyis ni //
T02D1793-1:206b-39: bla med bya ba bdag gis shes //
T02D1793-1:206b-40: da ni dbang bskur rin chen gyis //
T02D1793-1:206b-41: mgon po rjes su gzung bar mdzod //
T02D1793-1:206b-42: ji ltar bde chen mgon po yis //
T02D1793-1:206b-43: dpal ldan rdo rje chos can la ;
T02D1793-1:206b-44: / dag pa'i de nyid ces ston pa //
T02D1793-1:206b-45: mgon po bdag la 'ang de bzhin stsol //
T02D1793-1:206b-46: sdug bsngal kun gyi gnas gyur pa //
T02D1793-1:206b-47: gtso bo dmyal ba las 'don mdzod //
T02D1793-1:206b-48: sdug bsngal thams cad nges gcod phyir //
T02D1793-1:206b-49: mgon med la ni thugs rjes gzigs //
T02D1793-1:206b-50: khyod zhabs padma spangs nas ni //
T02D1793-1:207a-2: de phyir sangs rgyas mchog 'gro ba'i //
T02D1793-1:207a-3: dpa' bo thub chen bka' drin mdzod //
T02D1793-1:207a-4: gsol ba 'debs la mkhas pa yi //
T02D1793-1:207a-5: de ltar tshig mchog gsan nas ni //
T02D1793-1:207a-6: slob mar snying rje bskyed byas nas //
T02D1793-1:207a-7: bla ma dpal ldan yon tan mtsho //
T02D1793-1:207a-8: zhal ni rab tu dga' 'gyur bas //
T02D1793-1:207a-9: brtse ba dang bcas mgu ba yis //
T02D1793-1:207a-10: gsang ba'i las ni gsang ba mchog / dam tshig
T02D1793-1:207a-11: mchog de nyan du gzhug / khyod kyis srog chags
T02D1793-1:207a-12: gsad bya ste // ma byin par yang khyod kyis blang //
T02D1793-1:207a-13: gzhan gyi bud med bsten pa dang //
T02D1793-1:207a-14: tshig kyang brdzun du smra bar bya //
T02D1793-1:207a-15: thugs kyi sdom pa mchog 'di ni //
T02D1793-1:207a-16: bu bzang khyod kyis bsrung bar bya //
T02D1793-1:207a-17: bshang gci dang ni sha dang khrag / sems las byung ba lnga pa ste //
T02D1793-1:207a-18: khyi mi glang po ba lang rta'i //
T02D1793-1:207a-19: sha ni sbyang sogs cho ga yis //
T02D1793-1:207a-20: khyod kyis rtag tu bza' bya ba //
T02D1793-1:207a-21: 'di ni dam tshig rmad byung che //
T02D1793-1:207a-22: de nas sngar bshad pa'i dkyil 'khor ram yang na
T02D1793-1:207a-23: bsgom pas yongs su brtags pa'i lha'i 'khor lo thams
T02D1793-1:207a-24: cad kyi nang na bzhugs pa'i rdo rje slob dpon
T02D1793-1:207a-25: rdo rje 'chang chen po'i nga rgyal dang ldan pas
T02D1793-1:207a-26: rang gi rig ma'i padma'i khar bdud rtsi lnga'i ri
T02D1793-1:207a-27: lu bcug la / man ngag ji lta ba bzhin
T02D1793-1:207a-28: du yang dag pa'i dbang bskur ba'i don du snyoms
T02D1793-1:207a-29: par zhugs par bya ste rang gi lhag pa'i lha
T02D1793-1:207a-30: phyung zhing des 'gro ba'i don byas la //
T02D1793-1:207a-31: de dgug cing rang gi lus la bcug ste de'i
T02D1793-1:207a-32: rnam par 'gyur nas slob ma yang de'i rang bzhin
T02D1793-1:207a-33: du phung po la sogs pa byin gyis brlab pa
T02D1793-1:207a-34: rang gi lha mo dang bcas par bsams te /
T02D1793-1:207a-35: rang gi ba spu'i bu ga las byung ba'i 'od
T02D1793-1:207a-36: zer gyi lcags kyu'i tshogs kyis nam mkha'i dbyings ma
T02D1793-1:207a-37: lus par khyab par byed pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D1793-1:207a-38: rnams bsdus la / rang gi sku gsung thugs la 'jug ste lam la gnas par 'gyur zhing //
T02D1793-1:207a-39: rang gi snying gnas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams phyung la /
T02D1793-1:207a-40: mchog tu dga' ba'i tshe zhu bar gyur pa de dag la slob ma'i khar bcug par bya'o //
T02D1793-1:207a-41: ae ma'o bde chen 'di brjod nas //
T02D1793-1:207a-42: slob mas sems byung spyod par bya //
T02D1793-1:207a-43: 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02D1793-1:207a-44: dbang bskur ba yi gnas kyi mchog / las kyi rab 'byams mchog dang ni //
T02D1793-1:207b-1: de ni gsad pa'i dbang bskur ba'o //
T02D1793-1:207b-2: sems byung me tog dang bcas pa //
T02D1793-1:207b-3: padma la gnas blangs nas ni //
T02D1793-1:207b-4: rang gi zhal gyis mchod pa'i phyir //
T02D1793-1:207b-5: rig ma'i kha ru gzhug par bya //
T02D1793-1:207b-6: bshang gci sha dang yang dag ldan / mi yi dung phor la gzhag go //
T02D1793-1:207b-7: shin du dad ldan shes rab che //
T02D1793-1:207b-8: gzugs bzang sgrub pa po la dga' //
T02D1793-1:207b-9: rnal 'byor gcig la goms byas pas //
T02D1793-1:207b-10: dam tshig la mkhas rnal 'byor ma //
T02D1793-1:207b-11: sgrub pa pos ni bla ma la //
T02D1793-1:207b-12: sngar ni yon du phul ba gang //
T02D1793-1:207b-13: bla mas de nyid byin brlabs nas //
T02D1793-1:207b-14: slob ma de la sbyin par bya //
T02D1793-1:207b-15: me tog la sogs dam tshig ldan ;
T02D1793-1:207b-16: / sangs rgyas sogs kyis byin brlabs pa //
T02D1793-1:207b-17: de dang lhan cig snyoms zhugs pa //
T02D1793-1:207b-18: bla ma dang bcas la sogs pas //
T02D1793-1:207b-19: phyi yi nye bar spyod pa yis //
T02D1793-1:207b-20: rdor can gnyis pa bzhin du mchod //
T02D1793-1:207b-21: bkra shis pa yi tshigs bcad dang //
T02D1793-1:207b-22: rol mo dang ni sna tshogs dbyangs //
T02D1793-1:207b-23: rnga yab rgyal mtshan gdugs sogs dang //
T02D1793-1:207b-24: me tog phreng ba sogs kyis mchod //
T02D1793-1:207b-25: shes rab ye shes dbang bskur gyi //
T02D1793-1:207b-26: mnyam par brtan par gzhag nas ni //
T02D1793-1:207b-27: sngar ni thal mo dang sbyar ba //
T02D1793-1:207b-28: cho ga 'dis ni dbang bskur bya //
T02D1793-1:207b-29: de la rdo rje slob dpon spyan ma dang bcas
T02D1793-1:207b-30: pa'i gti mug rdo rje'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pas
T02D1793-1:207b-31: slob ma la ji ltar bshad pa byed du bcug
T02D1793-1:207b-32: la // rnam par snang mdzad dang snyoms par zhugs
T02D1793-1:207b-33: pa'i sangs rgyas spyan ma'i sprin kha dog dkar po'i
T02D1793-1:207b-34: byang chub kyi sems kyis yongs su gang ba'i chu
T02D1793-1:207b-35: shel gyi bum pa lag na thogs pa snoms par
T02D1793-1:207b-37: de rnams kyis dbang bskur la de rnams kyis snyoms
T02D1793-1:207b-38: par zhugs pa las byung ba'i kha dog dkar po
T02D1793-1:207b-39: byang chub kyi sems kyi rgyun gyis dbang bskur byas
T02D1793-1:207b-40: la / sku rdo rje dang spyan ma'i tshogs de
T02D1793-1:207b-41: dag thams cad bde ba chen po'i dbang gis gzhan
T02D1793-1:207b-43: mar gyi bum pa bzhin du bzhus pa ye shes
T02D1793-1:207b-44: kyi bdud rtsi'i rnam pa slob ma'i lus la rjes
T02D1793-1:207b-45: su bcug nas / de yang lha'i sku bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin du bsam par bya'o //
T02D1793-1:207b-46: don ni 'di ltar bshad pa yin te /
T02D1793-1:207b-47: rmongs pa la ni gti mug bdag / gti mug dga' ma'i rnal 'byor ldan //
T02D1793-1:207b-48: gti mug rgyun gyis dbang bskur bas //
T02D1793-1:208a-2: zhe sdang can la zhe sdang bdag / zhe sdang dga' ma'i rnal 'byor ldan //
T02D1793-1:208a-3: zhe sdang rgyun gyis dbang bskur bas //
T02D1793-1:208a-4: zhe sdang rdo rje rang nyid 'gyur //
T02D1793-1:208a-5: chags pa can la chags bdag nyid //
T02D1793-1:208a-6: chags pa'i dga' ma'i rnal 'byor ldan //
T02D1793-1:208a-7: 'dod chags rgyun gyis dbang bskur bas //
T02D1793-1:208a-9: shes rab ye shes bdag nyid can //
T02D1793-1:208a-10: rdo rje dga' ma'i rnal 'byor ldan //
T02D1793-1:208a-11: ye shes rgyun gyis dbang bskur bas //
T02D1793-1:208a-12: shes rab ye shes rang nyid 'gyur //
T02D1793-1:208a-13: zhes bya bas rang rang gi de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D1793-1:208a-14: dang rjes su mthun pa'i byang chub kyi sems kyi
T02D1793-1:208a-16: de ni shes rab ye shes kyi dbang bskur ro //
T02D1793-1:208a-17: de nas de ltar gnas pa'i slob ma'i lag du
T02D1793-1:208a-18: rig ma'i lag pa bla mas byin nas de bzhin
T02D1793-1:208a-19: gshegs pa rnams dpang por bya'o //
T02D1793-1:208a-20: 'di nas brtsams te bdag gis ni //
T02D1793-1:208a-21: 'di la rig pa yang dag sbyin //
T02D1793-1:208a-22: byang chub chen po bsgrub pa'i phyir ;
T02D1793-1:208a-23: / de bzhin gshegs pas snang bar mdzad //
T02D1793-1:208a-24: de nas slob ma la smra bar bya ste //
T02D1793-1:208a-25: 'di ni gzugs ma dga' ma ste /
T02D1793-1:208a-26: khyod kyis rtag tu bsten par bya //
T02D1793-1:208a-27: bar du gnas pa'i bla ma yis //
T02D1793-1:208a-28: slob ma'i spyi bor phyag bzhag nas //
T02D1793-1:208a-29: sangs rgyas nyid la thabs gzhan med //
T02D1793-1:208a-30: de phyir rig ma 'di nyid mchog / chos rnams thams cad gnyis med pa //
T02D1793-1:208a-31: gnyis su snang ba rtog pa yin //
T02D1793-1:208a-32: de phyir rtag tu khyod kyis ni //
T02D1793-1:208a-33: 'khor ba spang par bya ba min //
T02D1793-1:208a-34: 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02D1793-1:208a-35: rig pa'i brtul zhugs bla na med //
T02D1793-1:208a-36: rmongs pa gang gis 'das pa ni //
T02D1793-1:208a-37: de yi dngos grub thob mi 'gyur ;
T02D1793-1:208a-38: / de nas brtsams te des de la //
T02D1793-1:208a-39: gsang ba mchog ni bstan par bya //
T02D1793-1:208a-40: rgyud kun las ni gang zhig ni //
T02D1793-1:208a-41: brda yis rgyas btab sbas par bshad //
T02D1793-1:208a-42: yang ji lta ba bzhin du sangs rgyas la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pas /
T02D1793-1:208a-43: sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir //
T02D1793-1:208a-44: 'jig rten thams cad kun nas ni //
T02D1793-1:208a-45: ji ltar gdul bya sna tshogs pa //
T02D1793-1:208a-46: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gyis //
T02D1793-1:208a-47: da bzhin du rdo rje dang rin po che dang padma dang /
T02D1793-1:208a-48: 'khor lo bskor bar gyis zhes bya ba la sogs
T02D1793-1:208a-49: pa'i tshigs su bcad pa lngas rjes su gnang ba
T02D1793-1:208b-0: de bzhin gshegs pa thams @208b cad kyi rnal 'byor
T02D1793-1:208b-1: gyis snying gar lag pa g-yon pa'i khu tshur gyis
T02D1793-1:208b-2: chos gos kyi dkyil bzung ba'i tshul dang /
T02D1793-1:208b-3: g-yas pa'i mchog sbyin gyis phyag rgya rdo rje ming gi dbang bskur gyis lung bstan par bya ste /
T02D1793-1:208b-4: rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs //
T02D1793-1:208b-5: bdag gis khyod la lung bstan te //
T02D1793-1:208b-6: srid pa'i ngan 'gro las bton nas //
T02D1793-1:208b-7: shin tu srid pa grub phyir ro //
T02D1793-1:208b-8: he badzra n'a ma ta th'a ga ta siddhya sa ma ya stvam bhur bhu wa sva:/
T02D1793-1:208b-9: langs nas lung bstan pa 'dis mchog tu gsang ba'i
T02D1793-1:208b-10: chogs lung bstan par bya ba de la rdo rje
T02D1793-1:208b-11: 'chang chen po dang bcas pa de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D1793-1:208b-12: thams cad dang byang chub sems dpa' dang ;
T02D1793-1:208b-13: dkyil 'khor pa rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams
T02D1793-1:208b-14: cad kyi rang gi dam tshig gi slob dpon nyid
T02D1793-1:208b-15: du bya ba'i phyir ngag gcig gis bla na med
T02D1793-1:208b-16: pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung
T02D1793-1:208b-18: gzhan yang lung bstan pa'i phyag rgya chen po de'i
T02D1793-1:208b-19: gsang ba dam pa mchog gi dngos grub kyis byin
T02D1793-1:208b-20: gyis brlab pa dang sngags de nyid kyi stobs kyis
T02D1793-1:208b-21: dang par bya'o zhes slob ma la smras nas gsang
T02D1793-1:208b-23: chags bral dang mtshungs sdig pa ni //
T02D1793-1:208b-24: khams gsum las ni gzhan med de //
T02D1793-1:208b-25: de phyir 'dod pa'i chags bral nyid //
T02D1793-1:208b-26: blo can khyod kyis mi bya'o //
T02D1793-1:208b-27: aom ma h'a sa ma y'a ha na phat //
T02D1793-1:208b-28: de nas slob ma'i g-yas pa'i mthe bong nas //
T02D1793-1:208b-29: lag pa g-yon pas gzung byas te //
T02D1793-1:208b-30: slob ma gtso bo la brten cing //
T02D1793-1:208b-31: mar gyi dgang blugs brgya brgyad bsregs //
T02D1793-1:208b-32: sbrang rtsi mar dang zho bsres pa'i //
T02D1793-1:208b-33: dgang blugs brgya dang rtsa brgyad bsregs //
T02D1793-1:208b-34: kun gyi snying rigs rig pa yis //
T02D1793-1:208b-35: bsangs te snying gar reg par bya //
T02D1793-1:208b-36: bdud rtsi 'khyil ba'i bzlas bya ba //
T02D1793-1:208b-37: de yi dpung la srung sku dag dags //
T02D1793-1:208b-38: spyi bor gdugs ni sbyin byas nas //
T02D1793-1:208b-39: thal mo dang bcas sgor 'jug nas //
T02D1793-1:208b-40: gdugs dang bcas pa'i slob ma ni //
T02D1793-1:208b-41: dkyil 'khor sgo ru 'dud du gzhug / slob ma 'di ni bdag gis dbul //
T02D1793-1:208b-43: slob dpon gyis ni gdugs blangs pas //
T02D1793-1:208b-44: de la tshig snyan bstan par bya //
T02D1793-1:208b-45: da ni dkyil 'khor slob dpon te //
T02D1793-1:208b-46: sngags dang rgyud 'chang khyod yin te //
T02D1793-1:209a-2: lha mo rnams kyis yang dag bshad //
T02D1793-1:209a-3: sems can rnams la brtse ba'i phyir //
T02D1793-1:209a-4: khyod kyis dkyil 'khor cho ga yis //
T02D1793-1:209a-5: 'bad de bri bar bya ba dang //
T02D1793-1:209a-6: rgyud la slob ma sbyang bar gyis //
T02D1793-1:209a-7: de nas man ngag ji lta ba bzhin du byin
T02D1793-1:209a-8: nas drang ba'i don la sogs pa dang dgongs pa'i
T02D1793-1:209a-10: de nas ji ltar 'jug pa la de bzhin gshegs
T02D1793-1:209a-11: pa thams cad kyis dbugs dbyung ba sbyin par bya
T02D1793-1:209a-12: ste / gsang ba mchog gi dkyil 'khor 'di //
T02D1793-1:209a-13: dam pa mthong dang 'jug byas nas //
T02D1793-1:209a-14: sdig pa thams cad las grol ba'i //
T02D1793-1:209a-15: khyed rnams ding [?] nas bde bar gnas //
T02D1793-1:209a-16: khyod la slar yang 'chi ba med //
T02D1793-1:209a-17: bde ba chen po theg chen la //
T02D1793-1:209a-18: zil gyis mi gnon gsod byed pa //
T02D1793-1:209a-19: gang las 'jigs med rol bar gyis //
T02D1793-1:209a-20: srid pa'i sdug bsngal khyed la med //
T02D1793-1:209a-21: shin du srid pa grub phyir ro //
T02D1793-1:209a-22: dam tshig sdom pa grub pa 'di //
T02D1793-1:209a-23: khyod kyis rtag tu bsrung bar gyis //
T02D1793-1:209a-24: bka' lung dam pa rtag pa 'di //
T02D1793-1:209a-25: sangs rgyas kun gyis mnyam par gsungs //
T02D1793-1:209a-26: rdo rje zhes bya phyag rgya 'dis //
T02D1793-1:209a-27: byang chub sems 'dor mi bya ste //
